lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Something Irreplaceable
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer defeats an enemy or is hit, immediately restores HP equal to 8%/9%/10%/11%/12% of the wearer's ATK. At the same time, the wearer's DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% until the end of their next turn. This effect cannot stack and can only trigger 1 time per turn

lightCones.name: Under the Blue Sky
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 3 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Rutilant Arena
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

teams.name: F2P TB (Destruction) Team
teams.description: This F2P team involves Asta increasing the Trailblazers ATK, making them deal more DMG to enemies. March and Natasha can provide shields and healing to keep the entire party alive.

teams.name: AOE Physical Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Funnel all SP and offensive buffs into Trailblazer for consecutive extra turns of massive damage before the full turn cycle completes. Utilize Weakness Break to raise Trailblazer's attack. Be warned that this team is better in AoE situations than it is for single target

lightCones.name: Past Self in Mirror
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases all allies' DMG by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%, lasting for 3 turn(s). Should the wearer's Break Effect exceed or equal 150%, 1 Skill Point will be recovered. At the start of each wave, immediately regenerates 10.0/13.0/15.0/18.0/20.0 Energy for all allies. Effects of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: In Pursuit of the Wind
lightCones.description: After entering battle, increases all allies' Break DMG dealt by 16%. Abilities of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: Memories of the Past
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When the wearer attacks, additionally regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

relicSets.name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, Break Effect for all allies increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.

teams.name: F2P TB (Harmony) Team
teams.description: The Trailblazer's role in this free-to-play team is to provide supplemental DMG on a Weakness Broken enemy. March 7th can use her Skill on Gallagher to deal more Toughness DMG on an enemy and have her Super Break DMG increased.

teams.name: Trailblazer (Harmony) Break Team
teams.description:
The Imaginary Trailblazer works best with characters who rely on the Break Effect stat. A DPS with a high Break Effect stat like Firefly can take advantage of dealing a lot of Super Break DMG if the enemy is Weakness Broken.

Ruan Mei can increase the party's Break Effect and Break Efficiency. She can also delay an enemy's recovery from Break, allowing the team to have more chances of dealing Super Break DMG.

lightCones.name: Moment of Victory
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% and Effect Hit Rate by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. Increases the chance for the wearer to be attacked by enemies. When the wearer is attacked, increase their DEF by an additional 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% until the end of the wearer's turn.

lightCones.name: Landau's Choice
lightCones.description: The wearer is more likely to be attacked, but DMG taken is reduced by 16%/18%/20%/22%/24

lightCones.name: She Already Shut Her Eyes
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% and Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When the wearer's HP is reduced, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, for 2 turn(s). At the start of every wave, restores HP to all allies by an amount equal to 80%/85%/90%/95%/100% of their respective lost HP.

relicSets.name: Self-Enshrouded Recluse
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Shield Effect by 10%. 4-pc: Increases Shield Effect provided by the wearer by 12%. When an ally target has a Shield provided by the wearer, their CRIT DMG increases by 15%.

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: F2P TB (Preservation) Team
teams.description: Lynx can be used with the Trailblazer since she can heal the party and increase the chances of the Trailblazer to be hit, preventing your other units from getting hurt in the process.

lightCones.name: Along the Passing Shore
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. When the wearer hits an enemy target, inflicts Mirage Fizzle on the enemy, lasting for 1 turn. Each time the wearer attacks, this effect can only trigger 1 time on each target. The wearer deals 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% increased DMG to targets afflicted with Miragle Fizzle, and the DMG dealt by the wearer's Ultimate additionally increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%.

lightCones.name: Boundless Choreo
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. The wearer deals 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% more CRIT DMG to enemies that are currently DEF reduced or Slowed.

lightCones.name: Good Night and Sleep Well
lightCones.description: For every debuff the target enemy has, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect also applies to DoT.

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When entering battle, if at least one other ally follows the same Path as the wearer, then the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

teams.name: Acheron F2P Team
teams.description:
In this free-to-play team, Asta and the Fire Trailblazer can debuff the enemy through Burn and Taunt respectively. The Fire Trailblazer can equip the Trend of the Universal Market to apply Burn on enemies.

Since Acheron's kit becomes stronger when Nihility units are in the party, we recommend replacing your Supports as soon as you get debuffers.

teams.name: Acheron Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
Acheron's best team at Eidolon 0 and 1 consists of two other Nihility units to max out the DMG buff from her Bonus Ability.

Jiaoqiu and Cipher can debuff the enemies on their turn to add stacks for Acheron's Slashed Dream. Cipher can equip Lies Dance on the Breeze or Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat to have more chances of applying debuffs on an enemy.

Aventurine can provide shields to the party and implant a debuff on the enemy with his Ultimate. Unless Jiaoqiu is in the team, Preservation units paired with Acheron should ideally equip Trend of the Universal Market to apply a fire DoT on enemies when attacked.

teams.name: Acheron E2 Team
teams.description: If you unlocked Acheron's 2nd Eidolon, you can replace your second Nihility unit with a Harmony unit and still activate the full DMG buff from Acheron's Bonus Ability.

lightCones.name: An Instant Before A Gaze
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases the wearer's Ultimate DMG based on their Max Energy. Each point of Energy increases the Ultimate DMG by 0.36%/0.42%/0.48%/0.54%/0.60%, up to 180 points of Energy.

lightCones.name: Into the Unreachable Veil
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 12%. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases the Skill and Ultimate DMG dealt by the wearer by 60%, lasting for 3 turn(s). After the wearer. uses Ultimate, if this instance of Ultimate consumed 140 or more Energy, recovers 1 Skill Point.

lightCones.name: Today Is Another Peaceful Day
lightCones.description: After entering battle, increases the wearer's DMG based on their Max Energy. DMG increases by 0.2%/0.25%/0.3%/0.35%/0.4% per point of Energy, up to 160 Energy.

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Inert Salsotto
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

teams.name: Argenti F2P Team
teams.description: Argenti's free-to-play team has Yukong and the Remembrance Trailblazer as his support to provide CRIT and True DMG buffs. Natasha can provide healing to the entire party.

teams.name: Argenti Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
Argenti's Ultimate needs a lot of energy to dish out the maximum DMG. Sunday and Huohuo are Argenti's most valuable units as they can help regenerate energy for his Ultimate and grant ATK buffs to deal more DMG.

Tribbie is great Support for Argenti since she can help him deal additional DMG to Elite enemies.

teams.name: Argenti Double DPS Team
teams.description:
Argenti can also work on Dual DPS setups. For this team, Argenti doesn't have to use the fully charged version of his Ultimate so he can help stack up The Herta and Tribbie's kits.

Argenti has the option to use the Passkey Light Cone, which provides more Energy for an Ultimate spam playstyle.

lightCones.name: Something Irreplaceable
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer defeats an enemy or is hit, immediately restores HP equal to 8%/9%/10%/11%/12% of the wearer's ATK. At the same time, the wearer's DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% until the end of their next turn. This effect cannot stack and can only trigger 1 time per turn

lightCones.name: The Unreachable Side
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Arlan F2P Team
teams.description: Arlan prefers a full team consisting of two Supports and a Shielder. Yukong and Asta can increase his CRIT and SPD stats respectively while the Trailblazer can taunt enemies to prevent them from attacking a low HP Arlan.

teams.name: Arlan Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Deal lots of DMG with Arlan by stacking buffs from Supports and using his skill to sacrifice HP for DMG. Use a Preservation character's shield to prevent Arlan from getting knocked out at low health.

lightCones.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action deals 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% more DMG for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Memories of the Past
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When the wearer attacks, additionally regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

lightCones.name: Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds
lightCones.description: At the start of the battle and whenever the wearer's turn begins, one of the following effects is applied randomly: All allies' ATK increases by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, or all allies' Energy. Regeneration Rate increases by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%. The applied effect cannot be identical to the last effect applied, and will replace the previous effect. The applied effect will be removed when the wearer has been knocked down. Effects of the similar type cannot be stacked.

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Asta Mono-Fire Team
teams.description: Asta and Himeko's passives synergize well, considering Asta will boost Himeko's Fire DMG by simply being in the party. Asta can use the Planetary Rendezvous to increase the Fire DMG of your DPS units.

lightCones.name: Inherently Unjust Destiny
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by 40%/46%/52%/58%/64%. When the wearer provides a Shield to an ally, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by 40%/46%/52%/58%/64%, lasting for 2 turn(s). When the wearer's follow-up attack hits an enemy target, there is a 100%/115%/130%/145%/160% base chance to increase the DMG taken by the attacked enemy target by 10%/11.5%/13%/14.5%/16%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Moment of Victory
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% and Effect Hit Rate by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. Increases the chance for the wearer to be attacked by enemies. When the wearer is attacked, increase their DEF by an additional 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% until the end of the wearer's turn.

lightCones.name: Concert for Two
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. For every on-field character that has a Shield, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%.

relicSets.name: Self-Enshrouded Recluse
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Shield Effect by 10%. 4-pc: Increases Shield Effect provided by the wearer by 12%. When an ally target has a Shield provided by the wearer, their CRIT DMG increases by 15%.

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Aventurine F2P Team
teams.description:
Aventurine can work as a solo sustain unit in this free-to-play team. Herta can help stack up Aventurine's Blind Bet simply by unleashing Follow-up attacks.

Asta and Yukong can help buff the team's SPD and CRIT respectively.

teams.name: Aventurine Follow-Up ATK Team (1)
teams.description:
Aventurine works best in a Follow-up attack team since they can help him unleash his own Follow-up attack. Aventurine works well with Dr. Ratio and Feixiao since his Follow-up attacks and debuff can help them deal the most amount of damage possible.

Topaz can increase both Follow-up attack DMG taken by the enemy and Robin can increase everyone's CRIT DMG and Follow-up attack DMG. Cipher is also a great option for providing debuffs and frequent Follow-up attacks.

teams.name: Aventurine Follow-Up ATK Team (2)
teams.description:
Aventurine works best in a Follow-up attack team since they can help him unleash his own Follow-up attack. Aventurine works well with Dr. Ratio and Feixiao since his Follow-up attacks and debuff can help them deal the most amount of damage possible.

Topaz can increase both Follow-up attack DMG taken by the enemy and Robin can increase everyone's CRIT DMG and Follow-up attack DMG. Cipher is also a great option for providing debuffs and frequent Follow-up attacks.

lightCones.name: Night of Fright
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%/2.8%/3.2%/3.6%/4.0%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Time Waits for No One
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and Outgoing Healing by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When the wearer heals allies, record the amount of Outgoing Healing. When any ally launches an attack, a random attacked enemy takes additional DMG equal to 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% of the recorded Outgoing Healing value. This additional DMG is of the same Type as the wearer's, is not affected by other buffs, and can only occur 1 time per turn.

lightCones.name: Shared Feeling
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Outgoing Healing by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%. When using Skill, regenerates 2/3/3/4/4 Energy for all allies.

relicSets.name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer and their memosprite provide healing to ally targets aside from themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which can be triggered up to 1 time per turn, lasting for 2 turns. When the wearer has "Gentle Rain," increases SPD by 6%, and increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 15%. This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Giant Tree of Rapt Brooding
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's Speed is 135/180 or higher, increases the wearer and their memosprite's Outgoing Healing by 12%/20%.

teams.name: Any Team
teams.description: As your typical healer, Bailu brings massive healing to the entire party and can fit in any team.

lightCones.name: Reforged Remembrance
lightCones.description: Increases wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 40%/45%/50%/55%/60%. When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy inflicted with Wind Shear, Burn, Shock, or Bleed, each respectively grants 1 stack of Prophet, stacking up to 4 time(s). In a single battle, only 1 stack of Prophet can be granted for each type of DoT. Every stack of Prophet increases wearer's ATK by 5%/6%/7%/8%/9% and enables the DoT dealt to ignore 7.2%/7.9%/8.6%/9.3%/10% of the target's DEF.

lightCones.name: Eyes of the Prey
lightCones.description: Increases Effect Hit Rate of its wearer by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% and increases DoT by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48%.

lightCones.name: Patience Is All You Need
lightCones.description: Increases DMG dealt by the wearer by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. After every attack unleashed by the wearer, the wearer's SPD increases by 4.8%/5.6%/6.4%/7.2%/8%, stacking up to 3 times. If the wearer hits an enemy target that is not afflicted by Erode, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Erode on the target. Enemies afflicted with Erode are also considered to be Shocked and will receive Lightning DoT at the start of each turn equal to 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% of the wearer's ATK, lasting for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Prisoner In Deep Confinement
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases ATK by 12%. 4-pc: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

planarSets.name: Revelry by the Sea
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's ATK is higher than or equal to 2,400/3,600, increases the DoT DMG dealt by 12%/24%.

teams.name: Black Swan F2P Team
teams.description:
Black Swan will go in tandem with Serval as the two DPS characters in the party. Serval can also provide Shock DoTs with her kit.

Asta is the best free-to-play Support for Black Swan thanks to her SPD and ATK buffs for the entire party.

teams.name: Black Swan DoT Team
teams.description:
Black Swan shines in DoT-centric teams with Kafka as the Main DPS who can trigger her DoTs.

Ruan Mei can increase the party's Break Efficiency and delay the enemies' recovery from Break, which results in them taking in more DoTs before they manage to attack.

lightCones.name: The Unreachable Side
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.

lightCones.name: Dance at Sunset
lightCones.description: Greatly increases the odds that the wearer will be attacked and increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, they receive 1 stack of Firedance, lasting for 2 turns and up to 2 stacks. Each stack of Firedance increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attack by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%.

lightCones.name: A Secret Vow
lightCones.description: Increases DMG dealt by the wearer by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. The wearer also deals an extra 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% of DMG to enemies whose current HP percentage is equal to or higher than the wearer's current HP percentage.

relicSets.name: Longevous Disciple
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Max HP by 12%. 4-pc: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

planarSets.name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

teams.name: Blade F2P Team
teams.description:
This Free-to-Play Blade team will focus on keeping Blade alive and enhancing him through buffs. The Remembrance Trailblazer can increase Blade's DMG with True DMG and CRIT DMG buffs.

Lynx can heal Blade and increase his chances of being targeted by enemies, which will allow him to use his Follow-up Attack more frequently.

teams.name: Blade Hypercaryy Team
teams.description:
This Blade team comp is focused on enhancing Blade to become the Hypercarry of the party. Tribbie provides an All-Type RES PEN buff and additional DMG while Sunday focuses on buffing Blade through his Skill and Ultimate.

Hyacine is a great healer here because she can increase the party's Max HP. Lynx can be a 4-star alternative as she can increase Blade's chances of getting hit with her Skill, allowing Blade to use his Follow-up Attacks quickly.

teams.name: Blade Sub-DPS Team
teams.description: Blade can be a great Sub-DPS to pair up with other DPS units that can drain his HP, which can lead to more Follow-up attacks. Blade's HP consumption can also benefit characters like Castorice, who needs to consume party HP for her Ultimate.

lightCones.name: Sailing Towards a Second Life
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. The Break DMG dealt by the wearer ignores 20%/23%/26%/29%/32% of the target's DEF. When the wearer's Break Effect in battle is at 150% or greater, increases their SPD by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%.

lightCones.name: Shadowed by Night
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When entering battle or after dealing Break DMG, increases SPD by 8%/9%/10%/11%/12%, lasting for 2 turns. This effect can only trigger once per turn.

lightCones.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an additional 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, increase their ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 2 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%. 4-pc: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, ignores 10% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing Break DMG to them. When the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG they deal to enemy targets additionally ignores 15% of the targets' DEF.

planarSets.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.

teams.name: Boothill F2P Team
teams.description:
Getting more Break Effect means more damage for Boothill and Harmony Trailblazer provides that. They can also give him additional Super Break DMG, which is more damage on top of the Break DMG he deals.

Even though Boothill won't have much use for the ATK buff, Asta can still buff his SPD which gives him more turns. Natasha or any F2P sustain character would work as the last party member for healing and cleansing.

teams.name: Blade Break Team
teams.description:
Boothill's ideal team comp is in a Break team since it provides him with more Break Effect, which means even more damage. Sunday is a great since he can give him bonus actions and Energy Restoration.

If being paired with Boothill, Sunday should have -1 or -2 SPD behind Boothill.

Sunday allows Boothill to do back-to-back Enhanced Basic ATKs which allows him to ramp up even faster. Ruan Mei gives a ton of Break Effect and other buffs like RES PEN, while Lingsha is a healer that also scales with Break Effect.

teams.name: Boothill Super Break Team
teams.description:
For this team, Boothill gets additional Super Break DMG on top of the Break DMG he deals thanks to Fugue and The Dahlia. They also give him more Break Effect, which just improves his Break DMG even more.

For healing, Lingsha is the best choice since she scales with Break Effect.

lightCones.name: A Grounded Ascent
lightCones.description: After the wearer uses Skill or Ultimate on one ally character, the wearer regenerates 6 Energy and the ability's target receives 1 stack of "Hymn" for 3 turn(s), stacking up to 3 time(s). Each stack of "Hymn" increases its holder's DMG dealt by 15%. After every 2 instance(s) of Skill or Ultimate the wearer uses on one ally character, recovers 1 Skill Point.

lightCones.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action deals 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% more DMG for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Earthly Escapade
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 32%/39%/46%/53%/60%. At the start of the battle, the wearer gains Mask, lasting for 3 turn(s). While the wearer has Mask, the wearer's allies have their CRIT Rate increased by 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% and their CRIT DMG increased by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. For every 1 Skill Point the wearer recovers (including Skill Points that exceed the limit), they gain 1 stack of Radiant Flame. And when the wearer has 4 stacks of Radiant Flame, all the stacks are removed, and they gain Mask, lasting for 4 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Sacerdos' Relieved Ordeal
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%. 4-pc: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability-using target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Bronya F2P Team
teams.description: Bronya is great with Dan Heng since she can activate his Wind RES PEN buff by applying her buffs on him. Yukong can provide CRIT Rate and DMG buffs to Dan Heng, while Natasha can heal the entire party.

teams.name: Bronya Generalist Team
teams.description: Bronya shines as long as you have a hard-hitting CRIT DPS in the team. She can fill up almost any team that needs a DMG buffer, and her advance forward mechanic can help defeat enemies faster.

teams.name: Bronya Break Team
teams.description: Bronya can also work as a Support for Boothill in Break Teams since he can also deal critical hits. Combining Bronya's turn advance and Break Effect buffs from other supports can help Boothill inflict Weakness Break faster and deal more Break DMG.

lightCones.name: Dance at Sunset
lightCones.description: Greatly increases the odds that the wearer will be attacked and increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, they receive 1 stack of Firedance, lasting for 2 turns and up to 2 stacks. Each stack of Firedance increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attack by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%.

lightCones.name: The Unreachable Side
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

relicSets.name: Wavestrider Captain
relicSets.description: 2-pc: CRIT DMG increases by 16%. 4-pc: When the wearer is the target of another ally target's ability, gains 1 stack of "Help," stacking up to 2 times. When using Ultimate, if the unit possesses 2 stacks of "Help," consumes all "Help" and increases the wearer's ATK by 48%, lasting 1 turn.

planarSets.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
planarSets.description: When allies use follow-up attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

teams.name: Clara F2P Team
teams.description: This F2P Clara team focuses on keeping Clara alive so she can continuously deal Counter-Attack damage. Use Lynx to increase Clara's aggro and provide healing to counteract the received.

teams.name: Clara Follow-up Attack Team
teams.description: Funnel all buffs into Clara to increase her Follow-up attack damage. It's required to either have a healer or a shielder to keep Clara and the party alive.

lightCones.name: In the Night
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 10 SPD that exceeds 100, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).

lightCones.name: Sleep Like the Dead
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. When the wearer's Basic ATK or Skill does not result in a CRIT Hit, increases their CRIT Rate by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% for 1 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time every 3 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an additional 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, increase their ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 2 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Dan Heng F2P Team
teams.description: This Dan Heng F2P team comp can deal with most single-target situations. Yukong can increase Dan Heng's CRIT Rate and DMG while both the Trailblazer and Natasha can keep the party alive through Shields and Healing.

teams.name: Dan Heng Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
Dan Heng can deal a lot of DMG with characters who can Slow enemies down. Welt is one of the best party members here as he can slow down enemies to increase the DMG dealt by Dan Heng.

Sunday and Huohuo can provide energy and buffs to Dan Heng, which will activate his Talent's Wind RES PEN.

teams.name: Dan Heng Wind-Quantum Team
teams.description: This Dan Heng team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Wind. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team so she can implant a Wind Weakness on an enemy.

lightCones.name: Brighter Than the Sun
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. When the wearer uses Basic ATK, they will gain one stack of Dragon's Call for 2 turns. Each stack of Dragon's Call increases the wearer's ATK by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and Energy Regeneration Rate by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10%. Dragon's Call can be stacked up to 2 times.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Under the Blue Sky
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 3 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Imaginary DMG by 10%. 4-pc: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.

planarSets.name: Tengoku Livestream
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. If 3 or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, additionally increases CRIT DMG by 32% for 3 turns.

teams.name: Dan Heng - Imbibitor Lunae F2P Team
teams.description:
This Free-to-Play Dan Heng - Imbibitor Lunae team focuses on buffing Imbibitor Lunae's DMG so he can deal a ton of DMG. Yukong should be the only one using her Skill so she can buff Imbibitor Lunae's CRIT.

Asta's Ultimate will help increase Dan Heng - Imbibitor Lunae's SPD. She can use her Skill to provide ATK buffs if Imbibitor Lunae has Squama Sacrosancta stacks available.

teams.name: Dan Heng - Imbibitor Lunae Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
This team comp is focused on enhancing Dan Heng - Imbibitor Lunae to deal as much DMG as possible. Sparkle will be Imbibitor Lunae's best Support since she can feed him Skill Points and DMG buffs.

Tingyun can provide ATK buffs and energy so that Imbibitor Lunae can use his Ultimate. Aventurine can provide shields and increase the CRIT DMG taken by enemies with his Ultimate.

teams.name: Dan Heng - Imbibitor Lunae Mono-Imaginary Team
teams.description:
As an Imaginary DPS, Dan Heng - Imbibitor Lunae can work well in a Mono-Imaginary team. Sparkle can provide extra Skill Points for Imbibitor Lunae to unleash a fully charged Basic ATK.

Silver Wolf is a must for this team comp since she can add an Imaginary weakness if the enemy doesn't have one yet.

lightCones.name: Baptism of Pure Thought
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 20%/23%/26%/29%/32%. For every debuff on the enemy target, the wearer's CRIT DMG dealt against this target increases by 8%/9%/10%/11%/12%, stacking up to 3 times. When using Ultimate to attack the enemy target, the wearer receives the Disputation effect, which increases DMG dealt by 60% and enables their follow-up attacks to ignore 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% of the target's DEF. This effect lasts for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Worrisome, Blissful
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their follow-up attacks' DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, apply the Tame state to the target, stacking up to 2 stacks. When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, every Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%.

lightCones.name: In the Night
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 10 SPD that exceeds 100, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
planarSets.description: When allies use follow-up attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

teams.name: Dr. Ratio F2P Team
teams.description: This free-to-play team is your typical Hypercarry setup where Dr. Ratio is the Main DPS. March 7th can provide additional buffs and DMG while Asta can buff his SPD and has a chance to Burn the enemy.

teams.name: Dr. Ratio Generalist Team
teams.description:
Dr. Ratio's best teams typically consist of a buffer and a debuffer, with the latter being especially important for Dr. Ratio's Follow-up Attacks.

Cipher and Topaz have amazing synergy with Dr. Ratio as they can provide additional DMG and increase his Follow-up Attack DMG respectively.

If you have Aventurine, you can use Robin as your second Support unit to increase overall Follow-up attack DMG. Otherwise, use Silver Wolf to implant a lot of debuffs on the enemy.

teams.name: Dr. Ratio Mono-Imaginary Team
teams.description:
This Dr. Ratio team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Imaginary. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team so she can implant an Imaginary Weakness on an enemy.

If the enemy is already weak to Imaginary, you can replace Silver Wolf with another debuffer.

lightCones.name: I Venture Forth to Hunt
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 15%/17.5%/20%/22.5%/25%. When the wearer launches a follow-up attack, they gain 1 stack of "Luminflux" to a max of 2 stacks. Each stack of "Luminflux" enables the Ultimate DMG dealt by the wearer to ignore 27%/30%/33%/36%/39% of the target's DEF. When the wearer's turn ends, removes 1 stack of "Luminflux."

lightCones.name: Worrisome, Blissful
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their follow-up attacks' DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, apply the Tame state to the target, stacking up to 2 stacks. When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, every Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%.

lightCones.name: Baptism of Pure Thought
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 20%/23%/26%/29%/32%. For every debuff on the enemy target, the wearer's CRIT DMG dealt against this target increases by 8%/9%/10%/11%/12%, stacking up to 3 times. When using Ultimate to attack the enemy target, the wearer receives the Disputation effect, which increases DMG dealt by 60% and enables their follow-up attacks to ignore 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% of the target's DEF. This effect lasts for 2 turns

relicSets.name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
relicSets.description: 2-pc: ATK increases by 12%. 4-pc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, increases the DMG dealt by their Ultimate by 30%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
planarSets.description: When allies use follow-up attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

teams.name: Feixiao F2P Team
teams.description:
For a F2P team, Feixiao works well with March 7th (The Hunt) since they synergize together. Feixiao does Follow-Up Attacks whenever March attacks and these build up March's stacks. The same goes for Feixiao's Flying Aureus stacks.

March 7th (The Hunt) also increases Feixiao's SPD thanks to the Shifu effect. The Remembrance Trailblazer increases the team's DMG and provides True DMG, while Natasha is the healer.

teams.name: Feixiao Follow-up Attack Team
teams.description:
A Follow-Up Attack team with Feixiao requires characters that attack frequently or use Follow-Up Attacks to stack Flying Aureus easily. Cipher is a perfect fit for this because of her frequent Follow-Up Attacks.

Robin excels in dual DPS teams and provides offensive buffs, along with a team-wide Advance Forward on her Ult. Aventurine also does Follow-Up Attacks, provide Shields, and increases the CRIT DMG taken by an enemy through his Ult.

lightCones.name: Whereabouts Should Dreams Rest
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. When the wearer deals Break DMG to an enemy target, inflicts Routed on the enemy, lasting for 2 turn(s). Targets afflicted with Routed receive 24.0%/28.0%/32.0%/36.0%/40.0% increased Break DMG from the wearer, and their SPD is lowered by 20%. Effects of the similar type cannot be stacked.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Indelible Promise
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases their CRIT Rate by 15%/18.75%/22.5%/26.25%/30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%. 4-pc: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, ignores 10% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing Break DMG to them. When the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG they deal to enemy targets additionally ignores 15% of the targets' DEF.

planarSets.name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits an enemy target that has Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

teams.name: Firefly F2P Team
teams.description: For any team, Firefly needs the Harmony Trailblazer to increase her Super Break DMG. As for other free-to-play units, you can use Asta to increase Firefly's ATK and SPD, while Lynx can keep the party alive via healing.

teams.name: Firefly Super Break Team
teams.description:
For this team, Firefly, Lingsha, and Fugue will work together in dealing Super Break DMG to enemies.

The Dahlia provides more Break Effect and allows the team to deal Super Break DMG even if the enemy isn't Weakness Broken. She also increases the team's Break Efficiency. For healing, Lingsha is the best choice since she can do AoE healing and increase Break DMG received by enemies.

lightCones.name: She Already Shut Her Eyes
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% and Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When the wearer's HP is reduced, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, for 2 turn(s). At the start of every wave, restores HP to all allies by an amount equal to 80%/85%/90%/95%/100% of their respective lost HP.

lightCones.name: Moment of Victory
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% and Effect Hit Rate by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. Increases the chance for the wearer to be attacked by enemies. When the wearer is attacked, increase their DEF by an additional 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% until the end of the wearer's turn.

lightCones.name: Texture of Memories
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. If the wearer is attacked and has no Shield, they gain a Shield equal to 16%/20%/24%/28%/32% of their Max HP for 2 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered once every 3 turn(s). If the wearer has a Shield when attacked, the DMG they receive decreases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

relicSets.name: Longevous Disciple
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Max HP by 12%.

relicSets.name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Reduces DMG taken by 8%.

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Fu Xuan F2P Team
teams.description:
This Fu Xuan F2P team involves Dan Heng as your DPS. Fu Xuan can decrease the DMG taken and provide CRIT Rate buffs to increase Dan Heng's chances of slowing down enemies.

Asta and Yukong can also enhance the party through SPD and even more CRIT buffs respectively.

teams.name: Fu Xuan Generalist Team
teams.description:
Fu Xuan can be an effective Preservation character for any team and is capable of protecting the entire team by herself. Fu Xuan's role in the team is to provide both defensive utility and CRIT Rate buffs from her Skill.

You can replace one of the Support characters for a healer if you're up against tougher opponents.

teams.name: Fu Xuan Mono-Quantum Team
teams.description: This team requires Silver Wolf for her ability to ignore elemental weakness of enemies. With a team consisting of just Quantum characters, Silver Wolf will have no problem implanting a Quantum weakness on any enemy.

lightCones.name: Long Road Leads Home
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%. When an enemy target's Weakness gets broken, there is a 100% base chance to inflict the "Charring" state on it, which increases its Break DMG taken by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack 2 time(s).

lightCones.name: Never Forget Her Flame
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%. When entering combat, increases Break DMG dealt by the wearer and another teammate who triggered combat by 32%. If there is no teammate who triggered combat, applies this effect to the wearer and the teammate with the highest Break Effect. Effects of the same type cannot be stacked. When the wearer applies Weakness to an enemy target, recovers 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once, and trigger count resets when using Ultimate.

lightCones.name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat
lightCones.description: When the wearer hits an enemy and if the hit enemy is not already Ensnared, then there is a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% base chance to Ensnare the hit enemy. Ensnared enemies' DEF decreases by 12%/13%/14%/15%/16% for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%.

relicSets.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%.

planarSets.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.

teams.name: Fugue F2P Team
teams.description: Fugue's role in this free-to-play team is to provide DEF shred and Super Break to the team. Xueyi can benefit from this the most since her Follow-up attacks require the enemies to have their Toughness reduced.

teams.name: Fugue Super-Break Team
teams.description:
Fugue is best used in a Break Effect team as the Super Break enabler. Fugue can use her Skill on the DPS so they can have increased Break Effect.

Lingsha can also become an AoE DPS in Pure Fiction with this team by removing Firefly and adding Harmony Trailblazer for more Super Break instances.

lightCones.name: Scent Alone Stays True
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses Ultimate to attack enemy targets, inflicts the targets with the "Woefree" state, lasting for 2 turns. While in "Woefree," enemy targets take 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% increased DMG. They effect of increasing DMG taken is additionally boosted by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% if the wearer's current Break Effect is 150% or higher.

lightCones.name: Night of Fright
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%/2.8%/3.2%/3.6%/4.0%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Quid Pro Quo
lightCones.description: At the start of the wearer's turn, regenerates 8/10/12/14/16 Energy for a randomly chosen ally (excluding the wearer) whose current Energy is lower than 50%.

relicSets.name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Outgoing Healing by 10%.

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.

planarSets.name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits an enemy target that has Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

teams.name: Gallagher F2P Team
teams.description:
Gallagher can act as your typical healer in this free-to-play team comp. He can heal a party member as long as they attack the enemy affected with Besotted.

March 7th will act as your Main Break DPS here while the Harmony Trailblazer and Asta buff him up with Break Effect and SPD buffs respectively.

teams.name: Gallagher Break Effect Team
teams.description: Gallagher can work especially well with Supports that can increase the party's Break Effect. Fugue and Ruan Mei can help increase everyone's Break Effect and deal a lot of DMG on a Weakness Broken enemy.

teams.name: Gallagher Generalist Team
teams.description:
Gallagher can be a great sustain option for DPS characters who perform better against debuffed enemies. Gallagher's debuffs can increase Acheron's Slashed Dream stacks and can provide Dr. Ratio more chances to unleash his Follow-Up Attacks.

Gallagher can also be a great sustain for DPS characters that need constant healing. Castorice in particular can benefit from Gallagher's healing, which helps provide healing for her Memosprite Skill.

teams.name: Gallagher Fire-Quantum Team
teams.description: This team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Fire. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team as she can implant the missing Fire Weakness on an enemy.

lightCones.name: Moment of Victory
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% and Effect Hit Rate by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. Increases the chance for the wearer to be attacked by enemies. When the wearer is attacked, increase their DEF by an additional 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% until the end of the wearer's turn.

lightCones.name: Journey, Forever Peaceful
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's provided Shield Effect by 12%. When an ally target has a Shield, the DMG dealt increases by 12%.

lightCones.name: Landau's Choice
lightCones.description: The wearer is more likely to be attacked, but DMG taken is reduced by 16%/18%/20%/22%/24

relicSets.name: Self-Enshrouded Recluse
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Shield Effect by 10%. 4-pc: Increases Shield Effect provided by the wearer by 12%. When an ally target has a Shield provided by the wearer, their CRIT DMG increases by 15%.

planarSets.name: Belobog of the Architects
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by 15%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is 50% or higher, the wearer gains an extra 15% DEF.

teams.name: Gepard F2P Team
teams.description: This free-to-play team for Gepard has extremely high survivability, especially since he is paired with a healer like Lynx or Natasha. While you're still saving up your Stellar Jades for other 5-Star characters, this team can easily carry you through the early to mid-game!

lightCones.name: Good Night and Sleep Well
lightCones.description: For every debuff the target enemy has, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect also applies to DoT.

lightCones.name: Patience Is All You Need
lightCones.description: Increases DMG dealt by the wearer by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. After every attack unleashed by the wearer, the wearer's SPD increases by 4.8%/5.6%/6.4%/7.2%/8%, stacking up to 3 times. If the wearer hits an enemy target that is not afflicted by Erode, there is a 100% base chance to inflict Erode on the target. Enemies afflicted with Erode are also considered to be Shocked and will receive Lightning DoT at the start of each turn equal to 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% of the wearer's ATK, lasting for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Reforged Remembrance
lightCones.description: Increases wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 40%/45%/50%/55%/60%. When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy inflicted with Wind Shear, Burn, Shock, or Bleed, each respectively grants 1 stack of Prophet, stacking up to 4 time(s). In a single battle, only 1 stack of Prophet can be granted for each type of DoT. Every stack of Prophet increases wearer's ATK by 5%/6%/7%/8%/9% and enables the DoT dealt to ignore 7.2%/7.9%/8.6%/9.3%/10% of the target's DEF.

relicSets.name: Prisoner In Deep Confinement
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases ATK by 12%. 4-pc: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

planarSets.name: Revelry by the Sea
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's ATK is higher than or equal to 2,400/3,600, increases the DoT DMG dealt by 12%/24%.

teams.name: Guinaifen F2P Team
teams.description:
This free-to-play team involves Guinafen and Serval dealing as much AoE DMG as possible while applying Burn and Shock DoTs respectively.

Asta will provide SPD and ATK buffs for the entire party, while Natasha will keep your party alive through healing!

teams.name: Guinaifen DoT Team
teams.description: In this team comp, Guinaifen will act as a Sub-DPS that can use her Skill to apply the Burn DoT to enemies. Kafka would be the best pairing for Guinaifen thanks to the former's ability to instantly trigger DoTs.

lightCones.name: Earthly Escapade
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 32%/39%/46%/53%/60%. At the start of the battle, the wearer gains Mask, lasting for 3 turn(s). While the wearer has Mask, the wearer's allies have their CRIT Rate increased by 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% and their CRIT DMG increased by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. For every 1 Skill Point the wearer recovers (including Skill Points that exceed the limit), they gain 1 stack of Radiant Flame. And when the wearer has 4 stacks of Radiant Flame, all the stacks are removed, and they gain Mask, lasting for 4 turn(s).

lightCones.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action deals 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% more DMG for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Dance! Dance! Dance!
lightCones.description: When the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies' actions are Advanced Forward by 16%/18%/20%/22%/24%.

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Fleet of the Ageless
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

teams.name: Hanya F2P Team
teams.description: Hanya's role in this free-to-play team is to cast Burden a target enemy to regenerate more Skill Points for Dan Heng to use. Yukong can work in tandem with Hanya to buff Dan Heng's SPD and CRIT respectively.

teams.name: Hanya Generalist Team
teams.description: Hanya is excellent when paired with DPS characters who rely on using Skill Points to dish out as much DMG as possible. Hanya can also open up opportunities for other Supports who rely on their Skills.w

teams.name: Hanya Physical-Quantum Team
teams.description:
This Hanya team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Physical. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team so she can implant a Physical Weakness on an enemy.

Hanya can also equip the Planetary Rendezvous light cone and the Penacony, Land of the Dreams set to increase the DMG of the Physical DPS!

lightCones.name: Before Dawn
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by 48%/56%/64%/72%/80%.

lightCones.name: Night on the Milky Way
lightCones.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Yet Hope Is Priceless
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 16%/19%/22%/25%/28%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 20% CRIT DMG that exceeds 120%, the DMG dealt by follow-up attack increases by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 4 times. When the battle starts or after the wearer uses their Basic ATK, enables Ultimate or the DMG dealt by follow-up attack to ignore 20%/24%/28%/32%/36% of the target's DEF, lasting for 2 turns.

relicSets.name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Ice DMG by 10%. 4-pc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Sigonia, the Unclaimed Desolation
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 4%. When an enemy target gets defeated, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by 4%, stacking up to 10 time(s).

teams.name: Herta F2P Team
teams.description:
Herta alone won't be able to deal a lot of DMG, especially in F2P. A Main DPS like Serval will help you deal enough DMG to trigger follow-up attacks.

The Remembrance Trailblazer is a great pair with Herta to deal massive amount of AoE DMG through Follow-up attacks and True DMG.

teams.name: Herta Dual-DPS Team
teams.description: Herta can synergize amazingly with The Herta in this Erudition team. Use Herta's Follow-up attacks to regenerate energy for the Big Herta.

lightCones.name: Before Dawn
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by 48%/56%/64%/72%/80%.

lightCones.name: Night on the Milky Way
lightCones.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Eternal Calculus
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 8%/9%/10%11%/12%. After using an attack, for each enemy target hit, additionally increases ATK by 4%/5%/6%/7%/8%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and last until the next attack. If there are 3 or more enemy targets hit, this unit's SPD increases by 8%/10%/12%14%/16%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases follow-up attack DMG by 20%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks against the target enemy, increase the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack for a maximum of 8 times and lasts for 3 turns. This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Himeko F2P Team
teams.description: This F2P Himeko team focuses on the synergy between Himeko, Fire Trailblazer, and Asta. Asta helps improve the overall damage from Himeko and the Fire Trailblazer while Lynx keeps them all alive.

teams.name: Himeko Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Topaz buffs Himeko's Follow-up attacks and makes up for Himeko's lack of single-target DMG. Robin can buff both Himeko and Topaz's Follow-up attack DMG.

teams.name: Himeko Pure Fiction Team
teams.description: This Himeko team shines in content such as Calyx Farming and Pure Fiction. Himeko or Herta can break enemies and trigger the former's Follow-up Attack. Another Follow-up Attack will be dished out if an enemy has less than 50% HP remaining.

teams.name: Himeko Break Team
teams.description:
This team relies primarily on Himeko's follow-up attack and Fugue's talent. The extra Toughness meter from Fugue's Talent, if broken, count towards Himeko's charge, allowing Himeko to proc her follow up attacks continuously.

This allows Himeko to use Break Effect oriented Relics like Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge and Ornaments like Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern to enhance her Break DMG.

Ruan Mei provides Himeko buffs that can increase her Break Efficiency and Damage. For Sustain, Lingsha provides a Follow-up Attack that can heal and an ultimate that can inflict the Befog Debuff, which increases the Break DMG the enemies take from your characters.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Something Irreplaceable
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer defeats an enemy or is hit, immediately restores HP equal to 8%/9%/10%/11%/12% of the wearer's ATK. At the same time, the wearer's DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% until the end of their next turn. This effect cannot stack and can only trigger 1 time per turn

lightCones.name: Woof! Walk Time!
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, and increases their DMG to enemies afflicted with Burn or Bleed by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. This also applies to DoT.

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Rutilant Arena
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

teams.name: Hook F2P Team
teams.description: This F2P Hook team revolves around the synergy between all characters. Asta and Yukong can increase Hook's SPD and CRIT respectively.

teams.name: Hook Generalist Team
teams.description: Use Asta and Sparkle's Skills to buff Hook's overall DMG. Asta can also provide additional Fire DMG for Hook when she is on the field.

teams.name: Himeko Burn Team
teams.description: Take advantage of Hook and Guinaifen's constant Burn DoTs with Ruan Mei to increase the team's Break Efficiency.

lightCones.name: Night of Fright
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%/2.8%/3.2%/3.6%/4.0%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Post-Op Conversation
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% and increases Outgoing Healing when they use their Ultimate by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

lightCones.name: Time Waits for No One
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and Outgoing Healing by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When the wearer heals allies, record the amount of Outgoing Healing. When any ally launches an attack, a random attacked enemy takes additional DMG equal to 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% of the recorded Outgoing Healing value. This additional DMG is of the same Type as the wearer's, is not affected by other buffs, and can only occur 1 time per turn.

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Fleet of the Ageless
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

teams.name: Huohuo F2P Team
teams.description:
This free-to-play team involves Huohuo being the healer in the party. She can increase the party's ATK and regenerate energy so that other units can use their Ultimates more frequently.

Huohuo's healing may not be enough to sustain the entire team depending on the fight, so having a Preservation unit like Trailblazer (Fire) will keep your entire party from dying.

teams.name: Huohuo DoT Team
teams.description: Huohuo's Ultimate is great for DoT teams since most of their units scale on the ATK stat. Huohuo can restore energy to the party so they can use their Ultimates sooner.

teams.name: Huohuo Wind-Quantum Team
teams.description: This team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Wind. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team so she can implant a Wind Weakness on an enemy.

lightCones.name: Yet Hope Is Priceless
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 16%/19%/22%/25%/28%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 20% CRIT DMG that exceeds 120%, the DMG dealt by follow-up attack increases by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 4 times. When the battle starts or after the wearer uses their Basic ATK, enables Ultimate or the DMG dealt by follow-up attack to ignore 20%/24%/28%/32%/36% of the target's DEF, lasting for 2 turns.

lightCones.name: Night on the Milky Way
lightCones.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% for 1 turn.
