lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by 48%/56%/64%/72%/80%.

relicSets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

planarSets.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
planarSets.description: When allies use follow-up attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

teams.name: Jade F2P Team
teams.description:
Since Jade wants to be paired with a DPS that attacks frequently and does AoE damage, a great F2P DPS partner will be Herta since she does AoE damage and follow-up attacks.

Xueyi is also a decent F2P Replacement for Herta if you're fighting against Quantum-Weak enemies.

teams.name: Jade Erudition Team
teams.description: With Jade's follow-up attack talent triggering based on how many enemies a teammate hits, Erudition characters are great partners for her.

teams.name: Jade AoE Team
teams.description:
Jade can also pair great with certain characters who do AoE attacks that aren't from the Path of Erudition.

One particular character who synergizes very well with her is Blade. He not only does AoE attacks but also benefits from the Debt Collector buff that Jade applies since it counts as a separate source of HP reduction whenever Blade attacks.

Essentially, anyone who does AoE attacks from Basic, Skill, Follow-Up, or Ultimates will be a great partner for Jade.

lightCones.name: Those Many Springs
lightCones.description: Increases Effect Hit Rate by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate to attack, there is a 60% base chance to inflict "Unarmored". While in the Unarmored state, target receives 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% increased DMG for 2 turns. If the target is under a DoT inflicted by the wearer, there's a 60% chance to upgrade "Unarmored" to the "Cornered" state, which increases the DMG the target receives by 14%/16%/18%/20%/22%, lasting for 2 turns. During this, the wearer can't inflict "Unarmored" on the target.

lightCones.name: Incessant Rain
lightCones.description: Increases the wearers Effect Hit Rate by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy that currently has 3 or more debuffs, increases the wearers CRIT Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. After the wearer uses their Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, there is a 100% base chance to implant Aether Code on a random hit target that does not yet have it. Targets with Aether Code receive 12%/14%/16%/18%/20% increased DMG for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat
lightCones.description: When the wearer hits an enemy and if the hit enemy is not already Ensnared, then there is a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% base chance to Ensnare the hit enemy. Ensnared enemies' DEF decreases by 12%/13%/14%/15%/16% for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%.

planarSets.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

teams.name: Jiaoqiu F2P Team
teams.description:
Jiaoqiu can be used as your typical debuffer and is very effective with DPS units who can deal AoE DMG. Jiaoqiu can increase the DMG taken by enemies and Asta can increase the party's SPD and ATK.

Jiaoqiu will also benefit from Asta's ATK buff since his Ashen Roast DoT scales on the ATK stat.

teams.name: Jiaoqiu Acheron Team
teams.description:
Jiaoqiu works best with Acheron since his Ashen Roast debuff can stack up Slashed Dream during the enemy's turn.

With Jiaoqiu in the team, you don't have to use Trend of the Universal Market on your Preservation units since Slashed Dream can only increase by one during an enemy's turn.

teams.name: Jiaoqiu DoT Team
teams.description: Since Ashen Roast counts as a DoT, Jiaoqiu can be used as a Support in Kafka DoT teams. His role here is to provide Vulnerability to the enemies, helping Kafka and Black Swan deal more damage to them.

lightCones.name: Before Dawn
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by 48%/56%/64%/72%/80%.

lightCones.name: Night on the Milky Way
lightCones.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Today Is Another Peaceful Day
lightCones.description: After entering battle, increases the wearer's DMG based on their Max Energy. DMG increases by 0.2%/0.25%/0.3%/0.35%/0.4% per point of Energy, up to 160 Energy.

relicSets.name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases follow-up attack DMG by 20%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks against the target enemy, increase the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack for a maximum of 8 times and lasts for 3 turns. This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

planarSets.name: The Wondrous BananAmusement Park
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When a target summoned by the wearer is on the field, CRIT DMG additionally increases by 32%.

teams.name: Jing Yuan F2P Team
teams.description:
Asta is a must-have for a Jing Yuan F2P team since her Ultimate allows Jing Yuan to do 2 Skills before the Lightning Lord's turn.

The Fire Trailblazer and Natasha will protect the entire party through shields and healing.

teams.name: Jing Yuan Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
This Jing Yuan Hyper-Carry team focuses on increasing his damage output to make the Lightning-Lord's attack stronger.

Sunday will be your best Support here since he can Advance Forward both Jing Yuan and his Lightning-Lord while also some DMG buffs. Robin will increase Jing Yuan's follow-up attack DMG while Aventurine provides shielding.

lightCones.name: Flame of Blood, Blaze My Path
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 18% and Incoming Healing by 20%. When using Skill or Ultimate, consumes HP equal to 6% of the wearer's Max HP and increases the DMG dealt by this attack by 30%. If this effect's consumed HP is greater than 500, the DMG additionally increases by 30%. If the current HP is not sufficient, this effect reduces the wearer's current HP down to 1.

lightCones.name: I Shall Be My Own Sword
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 20%/23%/26%/29%/32%. When an ally (excluding the wearer) gets attacked or loses HP, the wearer gains 1 stack of Eclipse, up to a max of 3 stack(s). Each stack of Eclipse increases the DMG of the wearer's next attack by 14%/16.5%/19%/21.5%/24%. When 3 stack(s) are reached, additionally enables that attack to ignore 12%/14%/16%18%/20% of the enemy's DEF. This effect will be removed after the wearer uses an attack.

lightCones.name: The Unreachable Side
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

teams.name: Jingliu F2P Team
teams.description:
This free-to-play team involves Asta supporting Jingliu using True DMG and SPD buffs. The Ice Trailblazer can give CRIT DMG buffs and turn advance to Jingliu.

A healer like Lynx is important to counteract the party-wide HP consumption from Jingliu's Enhanced Skill. Lynx can also increase Jingliu's Max HP.

teams.name: Jingliu Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
In this team comp, Jingliu will be able to deal a lot of DMG with the help of the right supports. Sunday can increase Jingliu's DMG and provide extra turns to help her enter the Spectral Transmigration state sooner.

Tribbie can increase the party's DMG on an Elite enemy. Hyacine can increase the party's Max HP and provide healing to counteract Jingliu's HP consumption.

teams.name: Jingliu Double-DPS Team
teams.description:
This team comp takes advantage of Jingliu and Blade's excellent synergy with each other. Jingliu can consume the party's HP to increase her own DMG, while Blade can benefit from taking DMG to be able to dish out his Follow-up Attacks much sooner.

For this team, you may want Skill Point friendly party members as Jingliu and Blade cannot generate any Skill Points during their Enhanced States.

lightCones.name: Lies Dance on the Breeze
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 18%. After the wearer uses an attack, there's a 120% base chance to inflict "Bamboozle" on every enemy. While under "Bamboozle", enemies have their DEF decreased by 16% for 2 turns. If the wearer's SPD is higher or equal to 170, there's a 120% base chance to inflict "Theft" on every enemy. While under "Theft", enemies have their DEF decreased by 8% for 2 turns. When "Bamboozle" or "Theft" is repeatedly inflicted, only the recently inflicted instance takes effect.

lightCones.name: Before the Tutorial Mission Starts
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. When the wearer attacks enemies that have reduced DEF, regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy.

lightCones.name: Those Many Springs
lightCones.description: Increases Effect Hit Rate by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate to attack, there is a 60% base chance to inflict "Unarmored". While in the Unarmored state, target receives 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% increased DMG for 2 turns. If the target is under a DoT inflicted by the wearer, there's a 60% chance to upgrade "Unarmored" to the "Cornered" state, which increases the DMG the target receives by 14%/16%/18%/20%/22%, lasting for 2 turns. During this, the wearer can't inflict "Unarmored" on the target.

relicSets.name: Eagle of Twilight Line
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Wind DMG by 10%. 4-pc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

planarSets.name: Lushaka, the Sunken Seas
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. If the wearer is not the first character in the team lineup, then increase the ATK of the first character in the team lineup by 12%.

teams.name: Kafka F2P Team
teams.description: This F2P (Free to Play) Team for Kafka focuses on applying DoT and buffing her Speed. Asta is a nice Support since she provides ATK% and Speed buffs while also being able to apply Burn on enemies.

teams.name: Kafka DoT Team
teams.description:
A standard Kafka team will require an additional DoT character, one support character, and one healer or shielder.

You can also Kafka with two other DoT units, which will be especially effective with Hysilens on the team.

lightCones.name: Scent Alone Stays True
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses Ultimate to attack enemy targets, inflicts the targets with the "Woefree" state, lasting for 2 turns. While in "Woefree," enemy targets take 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% increased DMG. They effect of increasing DMG taken is additionally boosted by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% if the wearer's current Break Effect is 150% or higher.

lightCones.name: Echoes of the Coffin
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. After the wearer uses an attack, for each different enemy target the wearer hits, regenerates 3.0/3.5/4.0/4.5/5.0 Energy. Each attack can regenerate Energy up to 3 time(s) this way. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies gain 12/14/16/18/20 SPD for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Night of Fright
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%/2.8%/3.2%/3.6%/4.0%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%.

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.

planarSets.name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits an enemy target that has Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

teams.name: Lingsha F2P Team
teams.description:
Lingsha's free-to-play team consists of Imaginary March 7th and Trailblazer. March 7th should be built as a Break DPS for this team to work.

The Harmony Trailblazer can increase the party's Break Effect and enable Super Break DMG. Asta can increase the party's SPD and ATK, the latter stat is useful for Lingsha since her healing scales on the ATK stat.

teams.name: Lingsha Break Effect Team
teams.description: Lingsha is best used as a Sustain unit for Break Effect teams. Her Befog debuff can increase the Break DMG received by enemies, benefiting DPS units who deal Break DMG like Firefly and Boothill.

teams.name: Lingsha Erudition Team
teams.description: Lingsha in this team is there to restore HP to the party and her Skill, Ultimate, and Follow-up attacks can help restore energy to both The Herta and Tribbie.

teams.name: Lingsha Fire Team
teams.description:
Lingsha in this team can be used with Himeko against multiple enemies with a Fire weakness. Inflict a ton of Break DMG upon Weakness Break which in turn will activate Himeko and Herta's Follow-up attacks.

Ruan Mei is used here to increase Break Effect and Break Efficiency.

lightCones.name: Good Night and Sleep Well
lightCones.description: For every debuff the target enemy has, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect also applies to DoT.

lightCones.name: In the Name of the World
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DMG to debuffed enemies by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer uses their Skill, the Effect Hit Rate for this attack increases by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%, and ATK increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%.

lightCones.name: Those Many Springs
lightCones.description: Increases Effect Hit Rate by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate to attack, there is a 60% base chance to inflict "Unarmored". While in the Unarmored state, target receives 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% increased DMG for 2 turns. If the target is under a DoT inflicted by the wearer, there's a 60% chance to upgrade "Unarmored" to the "Cornered" state, which increases the DMG the target receives by 14%/16%/18%/20%/22%, lasting for 2 turns. During this, the wearer can't inflict "Unarmored" on the target.

relicSets.name: Prisoner In Deep Confinement
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases ATK by 12%. 4-pc: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

planarSets.name: Revelry by the Sea
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's ATK is higher than or equal to 2,400/3,600, increases the DoT DMG dealt by 12%/24%.

teams.name: Luka F2P Team
teams.description:
This F2P (Free to Play) Team revolves around Luka and his teammates inflicting various DoT debuffs.

Serval will be the DPS who can deal Lightning DMG and inflict Shock DoTs. Asta is also great choice for her SPD buffs and is able to inflict Burn DoTs.

teams.name: Luka DoT Team
teams.description: This is Luka's best team that involves the use of DoT. Kafka will be the Main DPS who can trigger DoTs using her Skill and Ultimate. Ruan Mei can increase the party's Break Efficiency and delay an enemy's recovery from Break.

teams.name: Mono Physical Team
teams.description:
Luka can be used in a team that mostly consist of Physical characters. Silver Wolf is the key party member that can add a Physical weakness if an enemy doesn't have it.

If the enemy already has Quantum as one of its base weaknesses, Silver Wolf can guarantee on implanting a Physical Weakness.

lightCones.name: Echoes of the Coffin
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. After the wearer uses an attack, for each different enemy target the wearer hits, regenerates 3.0/3.5/4.0/4.5/5.0 Energy. Each attack can regenerate Energy up to 3 time(s) this way. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies gain 12/14/16/18/20 SPD for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Night of Fright
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%/2.8%/3.2%/3.6%/4.0%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Time Waits for No One
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and Outgoing Healing by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When the wearer heals allies, record the amount of Outgoing Healing. When any ally launches an attack, a random attacked enemy takes additional DMG equal to 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% of the recorded Outgoing Healing value. This additional DMG is of the same Type as the wearer's, is not affected by other buffs, and can only occur 1 time per turn.

relicSets.name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
relicSets.description: 2-pc: SPD increases by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer and their memosprite provide healing to ally targets aside from themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which can be triggered up to 1 time per turn, lasting for 2 turns. When the wearer has "Gentle Rain," increases SPD by 6%, and increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 15%. This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Giant Tree of Rapt Brooding
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's Speed is 135/180 or higher, increases the wearer and their memosprite's Outgoing Healing by 12%/20%.

teams.name: Luocha F2P Team
teams.description: Luocha can act as a solo healer for any F2P Team. This lets your second team comp have a Natasha or March 7th on the team to act as a defensive support with the ability to cleanse debuffs.

teams.name: Luocha Solo Healer Team
teams.description:
With Luocha's ability to provide passive healing through his Talent, he can provide high sustain for high-speed team comps that can also attack multiple times before the field from his Talent expires.

Luocha can work in almost any team comp as a Solo support given how great his supportive tools are.

teams.name: Luocha Imaginary Team
teams.description:
With Luocha and Silver Wolf, it's possible to make an Imaginary mono-element team comp that can work in any fight. However, all characters in this team will need to be geared more toward doing damage.

If going with this team, it's highly recommended to have the Imaginary DPS use Wastelander of Banditry Desert to maximize their damage output.

lightCones.name: Night of Fright
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%/2.8%/3.2%/3.6%/4.0%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Time Waits for No One
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and Outgoing Healing by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When the wearer heals allies, record the amount of Outgoing Healing. When any ally launches an attack, a random attacked enemy takes additional DMG equal to 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% of the recorded Outgoing Healing value. This additional DMG is of the same Type as the wearer's, is not affected by other buffs, and can only occur 1 time per turn.

lightCones.name: Post-Op Conversation
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% and increases Outgoing Healing when they use their Ultimate by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%.

relicSets.name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
relicSets.description: 2-pc: SPD increases by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer and their memosprite provide healing to ally targets aside from themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which can be triggered up to 1 time per turn, lasting for 2 turns. When the wearer has "Gentle Rain," increases SPD by 6%, and increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 15%. This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Giant Tree of Rapt Brooding
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's Speed is 135/180 or higher, increases the wearer and their memosprite's Outgoing Healing by 12%/20%.

teams.name: Lynx F2P Team
teams.description: Lynx can be the solo healer for any F2P team. Here, Dan Heng will be your Main DPS with Lynx as the healer. Fire Trailblazer will provide the taunt and shields while Asta can provide more SPD and ATK buffs for the party.

teams.name: Lynx Counterattack Team
teams.description: Lynx can increase a unit's chances of getting hit with her Skill. This makes her useful with characters like Yunli or Clara, whose kits require them to get hit to deal damage.

teams.name: Lynx Solo Healer Team
teams.description:
Lynx's Ultimate can remove any debuff inflicted on one or all party members. Because of this, Lynx can work in almost any team comp as a solo healer given how good her kit is, giving her allies survivability, strong heals, and debuff cleanses.

Characters like Mydei and Blade want to get hit, so having Lynx provide healing to increase their taunt value turns them into a strong tank for the team.

teams.name: Lynx Mono-quantum Team
teams.description:
This team requires Silver Wolf since she can apply Element Weakness to enemies. With a team of just Quantum characters, Silver Wolf is guaranteed to apply Quantum Weakness on any enemy, assuming they aren't already weak to it by default.

Lynx will be the healer while Fu Xuan will mitigate the damage the team is taking. Lynx's Skill will increase Fu Xuan's taunt value while increasing her Max HP. Lastly, Seele will be the main DPS. If you don't have Seele, you can use Qingque instead.

lightCones.name: In the Night
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 10 SPD that exceeds 100, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).

lightCones.name: Baptism of Pure Thought
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 20%/23%/26%/29%/32%. For every debuff on the enemy target, the wearer's CRIT DMG dealt against this target increases by 8%/9%/10%/11%/12%, stacking up to 3 times. When using Ultimate to attack the enemy target, the wearer receives the Disputation effect, which increases DMG dealt by 60% and enables their follow-up attacks to ignore 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% of the target's DEF. This effect lasts for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an additional 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, increase their ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 2 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
relicSets.description: 2-pc: ATK increases by 12%. 4-pc: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

planarSets.name: Rutilant Arena
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

teams.name: March 7th (Imaginary) F2P Team
teams.description: March 7th (Hunt) can have Xueyi as her Shifu and thanks to their toughness ignore kit, they can help each other dish out their Enhanced Basic Attack and Follow-up Attack respectively.

teams.name: March 7th (Imaginary) Follow-Up Attack Team
teams.description: March 7th (Hunt) can use her Skill on a Follow-up attack DPS to easily stack up Charge stacks and use her Enhanced Basic Attack.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

lightCones.name: A Trail of Bygone Blood
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 12%. The Skill DMG and Ultimate DMG dealt by the wearer increase by 24%.

lightCones.name: Under the Blue Sky
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 3 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Ice DMG by 10%. 4-pc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Misha F2P Team
teams.description: This free-to-play Misha team is pretty straightforward as all you have to do is buff Misha with Asta's SPD buffs and Yukong's CRIT buffs.

teams.name: Misha Generalist Team
teams.description:
Misha is played as your typical DPS in this team. Sparkle provides extra turns and CRIT DMG buffs to Misha while Tingyun can restore Misha's energy for his Ultimate.

Huohuo can restore Misha's energy for his Ultimate and can buff everyone's ATK.

teams.name: Misha Remembrance Team
teams.description: This Misha team is great in the Simulated Universe game modes as long as you choose the Path of Remembrance. Misha and March 7th can Freeze enemies through the use of their Ultimates.

teams.name: Misha Ice-Quantum Team
teams.description: This Misha team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Ice. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team so she can implant an Ice Weakness on an enemy.

lightCones.name: Worrisome, Blissful
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their follow-up attacks' DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, apply the Tame state to the target, stacking up to 2 stacks. When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, every Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%.

lightCones.name: Baptism of Pure Thought
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 20%/23%/26%/29%/32%. For every debuff on the enemy target, the wearer's CRIT DMG dealt against this target increases by 8%/9%/10%/11%/12%, stacking up to 3 times. When using Ultimate to attack the enemy target, the wearer receives the Disputation effect, which increases DMG dealt by 60% and enables their follow-up attacks to ignore 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% of the target's DEF. This effect lasts for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an additional 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, increase their ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 2 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
planarSets.description: When allies use follow-up attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

teams.name: Moze F2P Team
teams.description:
In this free-to-play team, Moze will pair up with March 7th's The Hunt form. March can unleash Follow-up attacks if she has her E2 unlocked.

Yukong will increase the ATK of all allies with her Skill, while Lynx keeps the party alive through healing.

teams.name: Moze Follow-Up Attack Team
teams.description:
Moze is best used as a Sub-DPS in a Follow-up Attack team. The enemy marked by Prey needs to be attacked multiple times to unleash Moze's Follow-up attacks.

Feixiao will synergize well with Moze since his Follow-up attacks can help stack up Feixiao's Flying Aureus for her Ultimate. Feixiao's Ultimate counts as a Follow-up Attack, so the Prey state can help increase the DMG taken by the affected enemy.

lightCones.name: Night of Fright
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When any ally uses their Ultimate, the wearer restores HP for the ally currently with the lowest HP percentage by an amount equal to 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% of the healed ally's Max HP. When the wearer provides healing for an ally, increases the healed ally's ATK by 2.4%/2.8%/3.2%/3.6%/4.0%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts for 2 turn(s).
