When any ally launches an attack, a random attacked enemy takes additional DMG equal to 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% of the recorded Outgoing Healing value. This additional DMG is of the same Type as the wearer's, is not affected by other buffs, and can only occur 1 time per turn.

lightCones.name: Warmth Shortens Cold Nights
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 16%/20%/24%%/28%/32%. When using Basic ATK or Skill, restores all allies' HP by an amount equal to 2.0%/2.5%/3.0%/3.5%/4% of their respective Max HP.

relicSets.name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
relicSets.description: 2-pc: SPD increases by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer and their memosprite provide healing to ally targets aside from themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which can be triggered up to 1 time per turn, lasting for 2 turns. When the wearer has "Gentle Rain," increases SPD by 6%, and increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 15%. This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Giant Tree of Rapt Brooding
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's Speed is 135/180 or higher, increases the wearer and their memosprite's Outgoing Healing by 12%/20%.

teams.name: Natasha General Team
teams.description: Aside from being the only free healer at launch, Natasha's heals are quite good and can even cleanse debuffs from afflicted party members.

lightCones.name: Before the Tutorial Mission Starts
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. When the wearer attacks enemies that have reduced DEF, regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy.

lightCones.name: Incessant Rain
lightCones.description: Increases the wearers Effect Hit Rate by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy that currently has 3 or more debuffs, increases the wearers CRIT Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. After the wearer uses their Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, there is a 100% base chance to implant Aether Code on a random hit target that does not yet have it. Targets with Aether Code receive 12%/14%/16%/18%/20% increased DMG for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat
lightCones.description: When the wearer hits an enemy and if the hit enemy is not already Ensnared, then there is a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% base chance to Ensnare the hit enemy. Ensnared enemies' DEF decreases by 12%/13%/14%/15%/16% for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Eagle of Twilight Line
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Wind DMG by 10%. 4-pc: After the wearer uses their Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

planarSets.name: Pan-Cosmic Commercial Enterprise
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.

teams.name: Pela F2P Team
teams.description: Pela is a pretty straightforward Support unit that can have a big impact on any team. Pairing her with DPS units like Dan Heng or Serval can greatly help make clears faster with the amount of utility Pela provides.

teams.name: Pela Nihility Team
teams.description: Pela is one of the best Support units for Acheron, as she can debuff the DEF of all enemies and help increase the Slashed Dream count. You can use the Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat on Pela to have her debuff enemies simply by attacking.

teams.name: Pela Generalist Team
teams.description: Pela can be an especially great support unit for an Ice team once she hits E4, which unlocks her ability to reduce an enemy's ice resistance after using her Skill.

lightCones.name: Before Dawn
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by 48%/56%/64%/72%/80%.

lightCones.name: Night on the Milky Way
lightCones.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% for 1 turn.

lightCones.name: Geniuses' Repose
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% for 3 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Poet of Mourning Collapse
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: Decreases the wearer's SPD by 8%. Before entering battle, if the wearer's SPD is less than 110/95, increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 20%/32%. This effect also applies to the wearer's memosprite.

planarSets.name: Tengoku Livestream
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. If 3 or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, additionally increases CRIT DMG by 32% for 3 turns.

teams.name: Qingque F2P Team
teams.description: This F2P Qingque team focuses on dealing DMG in both single target and AoE situations. Dan Heng can deal with enemies with higher HP while the Fire Trailblazer and Lynx keep the party alive.

teams.name: Qingque Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Funnel all SP into Qingque for consecutive extra turns of massive burst damage before the full turn cycle completes. Sparkle and Tingyun provide amazing offensive buffs for her which boost her DMG even further.

teams.name: Qingque Mono-Quantum Team
teams.description: A Mono-Quantum team for Qingque works very well. Silver Wolf can apply debuffs and DEF reduction, while Fu Xuan can redirect damage taken to herself and reduce the DMG taken by the party.

lightCones.name: Ninjutsu Inscription: Dazzling Evilbreaker
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%70%/80%/90%/100%. When entering battle, immediately regenerates 30/33/35/38/40 Energy. After the wearer uses Ultimate, obtains "Raiton." After using 2 Basic ATKs, advances the wearer's action by 50%/55%/60%/65%/70% and removes "Raiton." After the wearer uses Ultimate, resets "Raiton."

lightCones.name: After the Charmony Fall
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%56%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases their SPD by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Make the World Clamor
lightCones.description: The wearer regenerates 20/23/26/29/32 Energy immediately upon entering battle, and increases Ultimate DMG by 32%/40%/48%/56%/64%.

relicSets.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%. 4-pc: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, ignores 10% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing Break DMG to them. When the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG they deal to enemy targets additionally ignores 15% of the targets' DEF.

planarSets.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.

teams.name: Rappa F2P Team
teams.description: For any team, Rappa needs the Harmony Trailblazer to increase her Super Break DMG. As for other free-to-play units, you can use Asta to increase Rappa's ATK and SPD, while Lynx can keep the party alive via healing and Debuff Cleanse.

teams.name: Rappa Super Break Team
teams.description:
Rappa and Fugue will work together in dealing a lot of Super Break DMG to enemies. Fugue will also help Rappa ignore enemy Weaknesses with her Skill.

The Dahlia provides more Weakness Break Efficiency, Break Effect, and can help inflict Super Break DMG outside of Weakness Break. Lingsha is the best choice for sustain since she can do AoE healing and increase Break DMG received by enemies.

If you're using an Abundance unit for Sustain, we recommend equipping them with the Quid Pro Quo Light Cone to provide energy for Rappa's Ultimate.

lightCones.name: Flowing Nightglow
lightCones.description: Every time an ally attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Cantillation. Each stack of Cantillation increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 3.0%/3.5%/4.0%/4.5%/5.0%, stacking up to 5 time(s). When the wearer uses their Ultimate, removes Cantillation and gains Cadenza. Cadenza increases the Wearer's ATK by 48%/60%/72%/84%/96% and increases all allies' DMG dealt by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action deals 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% more DMG for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: For Tomorrow's Journey
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases their DMG dealt by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
relicSets.description: 2-pc: ATK increases by 12%.

relicSets.name: Prisoner In Deep Confinement
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases ATK by 12%.

planarSets.name: Fleet of the Ageless
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

teams.name: Robin F2P Team
teams.description:
As a support, Robin brings the DMG boost and CRIT DMG buff for the party. Herta can do Follow-Up Attacks and can benefit from the CRIT DMG buff during Robin's Concerto state. Herta can be replaced by any F2P DPS character.

Even though Robin won't benefit much from the SPD buff, Asta can give even more ATK for her and buff the SPD of her other allies. Natasha or any F2P sustain character would work as the last party member.

teams.name: Robin Follow-Up Attack Team
teams.description:
Robin works well in a Follow-up Attack team since they attack multiple times in a single turn, which helps Robin regenerate Energy and also dish out extra damage during Concerto.

With Robin's ATK and CRIT DMG buffs, Feixiao and Cipher can dish out even more damage. Aventurine acts as the sustainer and provides even more buffs and shields for them, so this is a very solid team.

teams.name: Robin Generalist Team
teams.description:
Since Robin is a universal Harmony character, you can slot her in with any Hypercarry team composition and make it work thanks to her amazing offensive utility.

The extra damage she deals during the Concerto state is the icing on the cake. You can use any Hypercarry DPS that scales with ATK for this such as The Herta, Jingliu, Jing Yuan, and many others.

Her party-wide ATK, CRIT DMG, and DMG buffs are all great for DPS characters. On top of that, she gives all allies an extra turn after using her Ultimate which means your other Harmony character can buff your DPS again, and make them attack again.

teams.name: Robin DoT Team
teams.description:
Thanks to Robin's ATK and party-wide DMG buff, she can synergize well with DoT characters like Black Swan and Kafka while also providing them an extra turn with her Ultimate.

Black Swan and Kafka will deal even more damage with their DoTs. Huohuo can restore Energy for the whole team which helps Robin's Ultimate get back up much sooner while also providing even more ATK.

lightCones.name: Past Self in Mirror
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases all allies' DMG by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%, lasting for 3 turn(s). Should the wearer's Break Effect exceed or equal 150%, 1 Skill Point will be recovered. At the start of each wave, immediately regenerates 10.0/13.0/15.0/18.0/20.0 Energy for all allies. Effects of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: In Pursuit of the Wind
lightCones.description: After entering battle, increases all allies' Break DMG dealt by 16%. Abilities of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: Memories of the Past
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When the wearer attacks, additionally regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

relicSets.name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, Break Effect for all allies increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

teams.name: Ruan Mei F2P Team
teams.description: This free-to-play team involves Ruan Mei increasing everyone's DMG and Break Efficiency. March 7th will benefit from Ruan Mei's All-Type RES PEN and Break Effect buffs while the Trailblazer can provide Super Break DMG.

teams.name: Ruan Mei Break Effect Team
teams.description:
Ruan Mei can benefit any unit who scales on the Break Effect stat. Characters like Firefly and the Fugue can benefit from Ruan Mei's Break Effect buffs.

Ruan Mei can also delay an enemy's recovery from Weakness Break, which gives more chances to deal Super Break DMG to an enemy.

teams.name: Ruan Mei DoT Team
teams.description:
Ruan Mei is an outstanding Support for DoT teams as she can delay the enemies' recovery from Break, which lets the enemy take more DoTs before recovering to attack.

Ruan Mei can also increase DoTs inflicted through Weakness Break and her Break Efficiency buff can help trigger more DoTs at a faster rate.

teams.name: Ruan Mei Generalist Team
teams.description: Ruan Mei is excellent when paired with DPS characters whose attacks can dish out a huge amount of Toughness DMG. You can either slot in another Support for a stronger offense or a Preservation character to keep your party alive!

teams.name: Ruan Mei Dual DPS Team
teams.description: Ruan Mei can enable teams with two DPS characters as her buffs can affect the entire party. This is especially great against Elite enemies with the same Type of Weaknesses as the DPS characters' elements.

lightCones.name: Good Night and Sleep Well
lightCones.description: For every debuff the target enemy has, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, stacking up to 3 time(s). This effect also applies to DoT.

lightCones.name: In the Name of the World
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DMG to debuffed enemies by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer uses their Skill, the Effect Hit Rate for this attack increases by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%, and ATK increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%.

lightCones.name: Those Many Springs
lightCones.description: Increases Effect Hit Rate by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate to attack, there is a 60% base chance to inflict "Unarmored". While in the Unarmored state, target receives 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% increased DMG for 2 turns. If the target is under a DoT inflicted by the wearer, there's a 60% chance to upgrade "Unarmored" to the "Cornered" state, which increases the DMG the target receives by 14%/16%/18%/20%/22%, lasting for 2 turns. During this, the wearer can't inflict "Unarmored" on the target.

relicSets.name: Prisoner In Deep Confinement
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases ATK by 12%. 4-pc: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

planarSets.name: Revelry by the Sea
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's ATK is higher than or equal to 2,400/3,600, increases the DoT DMG dealt by 12%/24%.

teams.name: Sampo F2P Team
teams.description: This Sampo F2P team revolves around dealing DMG through DoT. Serval and Asta can apply Shock and Burn status effects while Sampo can increase the DoT taken.

teams.name: Sampo DoT Team
teams.description: Sampo's Ultimate can buff any character with a DoT in their kit and even DoTs from breaking the opponents' weaknesses. Kafka is Sampo's best teammate as she can trigger active DoTs using her Skill and Ultimate.

lightCones.name: In the Night
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 10 SPD that exceeds 100, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).

lightCones.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an additional 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, increase their ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Sleep Like the Dead
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. When the wearer's Basic ATK or Skill does not result in a CRIT Hit, increases their CRIT Rate by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% for 1 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time every 3 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

planarSets.name: Rutilant Arena
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

teams.name: Seele F2P Team
teams.description:
This F2P (Free to Play) Team for Seele focuses on buffing and keeping her alive. Asta provides Speed and ATK% buff for Seele while the Fire Trailblazer acts at the tank to draw away aggro from Seele.

Natasha is here to keep the Fire Trailblazer alive so they can keep tanking or remove debuffs on the team.

teams.name: Seele Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Seele works best with characters that can advance her turn and restore her energy. Sunday and Tingyun fit the bill since they allow Seele to access her Ultimate as soon as possible.

teams.name: Seele Mono-Quantum Team
teams.description:
This team requires Silver Wolf to ignore the elemental weakness of enemies. Silver Wolf will have no problem implanting a Quantum weakness on any enemy. If the enemy is already weak to Quantum, Silver Wolf can be replaced with another Harmony unit or a Sub-DPS.

Sparkle can advance Seele's turn and provide DMG buffs while Fu Xuan is there to protect the party and give out CRIT Rate buffs to strengthen Seele.

lightCones.name: An Instant Before A Gaze
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases the wearer's Ultimate DMG based on their Max Energy. Each point of Energy increases the Ultimate DMG by 0.36%/0.42%/0.48%/0.54%/0.60%, up to 180 points of Energy.

lightCones.name: Before Dawn
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. Increases the wearer's Skill and Ultimate DMG by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. After the wearer uses their Skill or Ultimate, they gain Somnus Corpus. Upon triggering a follow-up attack, Somnus Corpus will be consumed and the follow-up attack DMG increases by 48%/56%/64%/72%/80%.

lightCones.name: Night on the Milky Way
lightCones.description: For every enemy on the field, increases the wearer's ATK by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, up to 5 stacks. When an enemy is inflicted with Weakness Break, the DMG dealt by the wearer increases by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% for 1 turn.

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Serval F2P Team
teams.description: This F2P Serval team focuses on dealing DMG in both single target and AoE situations. Dan Heng can deal with tankier enemies while the Fire Trailblazer and Natasha keep the party alive.

teams.name: Serval Dual DPS Team
teams.description:
Serval can be used as an effective Sub-DPS to stack up The Herta's Interpretation. Spam Serval's Ultimate to fill up the energy of The Herta's Ultimate.

For this team, we recommend equipping Serval with the Passkey Light Cone, Energy Regen rope, and an Effect Hit Rate body to use her Ultimate frequently.

teams.name: Serval DoT Team
teams.description:
Serval can apply the Shock DoT to enemies using her Skill and keep the status on them using her Ultimate. Kafka can trigger the Shock DoT with her Skill.

Ruan Mei can increase Serval's Break Efficiency and delay an enemy's recovery from Break.

lightCones.name: Lies Dance on the Breeze
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 18%. After the wearer uses an attack, there's a 120% base chance to inflict "Bamboozle" on every enemy. While under "Bamboozle", enemies have their DEF decreased by 16% for 2 turns. If the wearer's SPD is higher or equal to 170, there's a 120% base chance to inflict "Theft" on every enemy. While under "Theft", enemies have their DEF decreased by 8% for 2 turns. When "Bamboozle" or "Theft" is repeatedly inflicted, only the recently inflicted instance takes effect.

lightCones.name: Before the Tutorial Mission Starts
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40%. When the wearer attacks enemies that have reduced DEF, regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy.

lightCones.name: Holiday Thermae Escapade
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DMG dealt by 16%. After the wearer attacks, there is a 100% base chance that the attacked target is inflicted with Vulnerability, increasing the DMG they receive by 10% for 2 turn(s). The same effect type cannot be stacked.

relicSets.name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.

planarSets.name: Lushaka, the Sunken Seas
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. If the wearer is not the first character in the team lineup, then increase the ATK of the first character in the team lineup by 12%.

teams.name: Silver Wolf F2P Team
teams.description: This Silver Wolf budget team comp can work with almost every DPS unit. Do note that the DPS should be placed on the first position so that Silver Wolf can easily implant their Element on the enemy.

teams.name: Silver Wolf Nihility Team
teams.description:
Silver Wolf is great for characters who benefit from attacking debuffed enemies. Silver Wolf can provide debuffs to stack up Acheron's Slashed Dream.

Other Nihility units like Jiaoqiu and Cipher can help increase the Slashed Dream stacks, especially with the Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat Light Cone.

teams.name: Silver Wolf Generalist Team
teams.description: As for other teams, you can use Silver Wolf as your second Support for most teams. Silver Wolf can be used to implant a missing weakness on an enemy, with the element of the character positioned first being prioritized.

lightCones.name: Earthly Escapade
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 32%/39%/46%/53%/60%. At the start of the battle, the wearer gains Mask, lasting for 3 turn(s). While the wearer has Mask, the wearer's allies have their CRIT Rate increased by 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% and their CRIT DMG increased by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. For every 1 Skill Point the wearer recovers (including Skill Points that exceed the limit), they gain 1 stack of Radiant Flame. And when the wearer has 4 stacks of Radiant Flame, all the stacks are removed, and they gain Mask, lasting for 4 turn(s).

lightCones.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action deals 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% more DMG for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: A Grounded Ascent
lightCones.description: After the wearer uses Skill or Ultimate on one ally character, the wearer regenerates 6 Energy and the ability's target receives 1 stack of "Hymn" for 3 turn(s), stacking up to 3 time(s). Each stack of "Hymn" increases its holder's DMG dealt by 15%. After every 2 instance(s) of Skill or Ultimate the wearer uses on one ally character, recovers 1 Skill Point.

relicSets.name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.  4-pc: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability-using target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Sparkle F2P Team
teams.description:
You can use Qingque and Lynx as free-to-play units to utilize Sparkle's Bonus Ability that increases all Quantum units' ATK.

Qingque is the best free-to-play DPS paired with Sparkle since she can take advantage of the DMG buffs from consuming Skill Points.

teams.name: Sparkle Mono-Quantum Team
teams.description: Sparkle's entire kit is fully utilized in a Mono-Quantum team. If the enemy doesn't have a Quantum weakness, you can use Silver Wolf to apply the missing Quantum weakness.

teams.name: Sparkle Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
This Sparkle team uses Imbibitor Lunae to deal as much DMG as possible by feeding him Skill Points. Tingyun can restore energy for Imbibitor Lunae so he can use his Ultimate more frequently.

Luocha is the best sustain unit for this team since he doesn't have to consume Skill Points to provide healing.

lightCones.name: A Grounded Ascent
lightCones.description: After the wearer uses Skill or Ultimate on one ally character, the wearer regenerates 6 Energy and the ability's target receives 1 stack of "Hymn" for 3 turn(s), stacking up to 3 time(s). Each stack of "Hymn" increases its holder's DMG dealt by 15%. After every 2 instance(s) of Skill or Ultimate the wearer uses on one ally character, recovers 1 Skill Point.

lightCones.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action deals 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% more DMG for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Earthly Escapade
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 32%/39%/46%/53%/60%. At the start of the battle, the wearer gains Mask, lasting for 3 turn(s). While the wearer has Mask, the wearer's allies have their CRIT Rate increased by 10%/11%/12%/13%/14% and their CRIT DMG increased by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. For every 1 Skill Point the wearer recovers (including Skill Points that exceed the limit), they gain 1 stack of Radiant Flame. And when the wearer has 4 stacks of Radiant Flame, all the stacks are removed, and they gain Mask, lasting for 4 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.  4-pc: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability-using target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Sunday F2P Team
teams.description:
Since Sunday is a universal Harmony character, you can pair him up with any of the free DPS characters. He gives them an extra turn and provides them with offensive buffs, while also restoring their Energy through his Ultimate.

Asta provides an ATK boost and more SPD for the whole party, which results in more turns. Lynx heals and cleanses debuffs for the party.

teams.name: Sunday Summons Team
teams.description:
Since Sunday can also Advance Forward Summons, this makes him a great support for DPS characters who rely on Summons like Aglaea or Jing Yuan. He also provides them with offensive buffs and restores their Energy.

Robin provides more offensive buffs and another Advance Forward on her Ultimate, which results in even more turns. Huohuo can restore the party's energy with her Ult and provide healing with her kit.

teams.name: Sunday Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
Since Sunday is a universal Harmony character, you can put him in with any Hypercarry team composition and make it work thanks to his utility and offensive buffs.

You can use any Hypercarry DPS like Mydei, Seele, Jingliu, and many others. However, Sunday falls off with Break or DoT characters since there are better supports for them.

teams.name: Sunday Dual DPS Team
teams.description: Sunday can also enable a double DPS team setup since he can give the main DPS extra turns, offensive buffs, and restore their Energy. This allows the main DPS to act more and activate their partner like Jade.

lightCones.name: In the Night
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 10 SPD that exceeds 100, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).

lightCones.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an additional 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, increase their ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Swordplay
lightCones.description: For each time the wearer hits the same target, DMG dealt increases by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, stacking up to 5 time(s). The stack effect will be reset when the wearer changes targets.

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Sushang F2P Team
teams.description: You will want to pair Sushang with a secondary DPS to make up for her lack of AoE damage and for breaking the Toughness bar of an enemy that's not weak to Physical damage.

teams.name: Sushang Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Funnel all SP and offensive buffs into Sushang for consecutive extra turns of massive burst damage before the full turn cycle completes. Utilize Weakness Break to deal higher damage to enemies.

lightCones.name: Dance! Dance! Dance!
lightCones.description: When the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies' actions are Advanced Forward by 16%/18%/20%/22%/24%.

lightCones.name: Flowing Nightglow
lightCones.description: Every time an ally attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Cantillation. Each stack of Cantillation increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 3.0%/3.5%/4.0%/4.5%/5.0%, stacking up to 5 time(s). When the wearer uses their Ultimate, removes Cantillation and gains Cadenza. Cadenza increases the Wearer's ATK by 48%/60%/72%/84%/96% and increases all allies' DMG dealt by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: But the Battle Isn't Over
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% and regenerates 1 Skill Point when the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally. This effect can be triggered after every 2 uses of the wearer's Ultimate. When the wearer uses their Skill, the next ally taking action deals 30%/35%/40%/45%/50% more DMG for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.  4-pc: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability-using target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Tingyun F2P Team
teams.description: As one of the best supports in the game, Tingyun can be added to any Team Comp that has room for her. For a F2P team, Dan Heng would especially want Tingyun in the team since his Talent, which only activates when he's targeted by an ally's ability, synergizes well with her.

teams.name: Tingyun Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Tingyun's offensive buffs are great by themselves, but pairing her with another offensive buffer like Sparkle will significantly ramp up the damage output of a single Main DPS unit. This enables the DPS to be powerful enough to take out enemies with ease.

lightCones.name: Worrisome, Blissful
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their follow-up attacks' DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, apply the Tame state to the target, stacking up to 2 stacks. When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, every Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%.

lightCones.name: Cruising in the Stellar Sea
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, and increases their CRIT rate against enemies with HP less than or equal to 50% by an additional 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, increase their ATK by 20%/25%/30%/35%/40% for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: See You at the End
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 24%. The Skill DMG and Follow-up ATK DMG dealt by the wearer increase by 24%.

relicSets.name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases follow-up attack DMG by 20%. 4-pc: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks against the target enemy, increase the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack for a maximum of 8 times and lasts for 3 turns. This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

planarSets.name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
planarSets.description: When allies use follow-up attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

teams.name: Topaz F2P Team
teams.description: This free-to-play team involves Asta supporting Topaz through SPD and ATK buffs. March can buff Topaz's SPD and CRIT DMG plus provide additional DMG with her Enhanced Basic ATK.

teams.name: Topaz Follow-Up Attack Team
teams.description:
In these team comps, Topaz will act as a Sub-DPS that can use her Skill to increase the enemy's DMG from Follow-up Attacks. Feixiao and Dr. Ratio are the best DPS units to be paired up with Topaz as most of their DMG comes from Follow-up attack DMG.

If you have Aventurine in a Dr. Ratio team, you can use Robin as your second Support unit since she can increase Follow-up attack DMG. Otherwise, use Silver Wolf to implant a lot of debuffs on the enemy.

teams.name: Topaz Fire-Quantum Team
teams.description:
This team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Fire. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team as she can implant the missing Fire Weakness on an enemy.

Topaz can help break the Weakness of tougher enemies so that Himeko can do Follow-up attacks more frequently.

lightCones.name: In the Name of the World
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DMG to debuffed enemies by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. When the wearer uses their Skill, the Effect Hit Rate for this attack increases by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%, and ATK increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%.

lightCones.name: Along the Passing Shore
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. When the wearer hits an enemy target, inflicts Mirage Fizzle on the enemy, lasting for 1 turn. Each time the wearer attacks, this effect can only trigger 1 time on each target. The wearer deals 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% increased DMG to targets afflicted with Miragle Fizzle, and the DMG dealt by the wearer's Ultimate additionally increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%.

lightCones.name: Boundless Choreo
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%. The wearer deals 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% more CRIT DMG to enemies that are currently DEF reduced or Slowed.

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Pan-Cosmic Commercial Enterprise
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.

teams.name: Welt F2P Team
teams.description: Use Welt's kit to slow enemies so enemies will take increased DMG from Dan Heng's attacks. Use Yukong's Ultimate to buff both Welt and Dan Heng's CRIT.

teams.name: Welt Generalist Team
teams.description:
Welt can be a Sub-DPS who can both deal DMG and debuff enemies to delay their turns. Acheron is Welt's best DPS since he can help debuff an enemy to increase Acheron's Slashed Dream count.

For Acheron specifically, Welt can equip the Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat Light Cone to increase his chances of debuffing an enemy.

teams.name: Welt Mono-Imaginary Team
teams.description:
This Welt team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Imaginary. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team so she can implant an Imaginary Weakness on an enemy.

If the enemy is already weak to Imaginary, you can replace Silver Wolf with another unit.

lightCones.name: Whereabouts Should Dreams Rest
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. When the wearer deals Break DMG to an enemy target, inflicts Routed on the enemy, lasting for 2 turn(s). Targets afflicted with Routed receive 24.0%/28.0%/32.0%/36.0%/40.0% increased Break DMG from the wearer, and their SPD is lowered by 20%. Effects of the similar type cannot be stacked.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Indelible Promise
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases their CRIT Rate by 15%/18.75%/22.5%/26.25%/30%, lasting for 2 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

planarSets.name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.

teams.name: Xueyi F2P Team
teams.description: Xueyi will act as the main DPS for this F2P team. Imaginary Trailblazer and Asta can provide her with a variety of buffs such as Break Effect, ATK, and SPD. Lastly, Natasha acts as the main healer of the team.

teams.name: Xueyi Super Break Team
teams.description:
Xueyi can shine with Supports that can increase her Break Effect. Fugue and Ruan Mei can help increase Xueyi's Break Effect and deal a lot of DMG on a Weakness Broken enemy.

Xueyi has the option to use the Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge Relic for increased Super Break DMG.

teams.name: Xueyi Generalist Team
teams.description: Xueyi is can be used as a Sub-DPS who can deal DMG outside of her turn with her Follow-up Attacks. The other DPS can help trigger Xueyi's Follow-Up attacks simply by inflicting Weakness Break on enemies!

teams.name: Xueyi Mono-Quantum Team
teams.description:
Xueyi can be used in a Mono-Quantum team comp which requires Silver Wolf to implant the missing Quantum Weakness with her Skill.

If the enemy is already weak to Quantum, you can replace Silver Wolf with a Harmony Character that covers another type of weakness.

lightCones.name: In the Night
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. While the wearer is in battle, for every 10 SPD that exceeds 100, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by 6%/7%/8%/9%/10% and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. This effect can stack up to 6 time(s).

lightCones.name: Sleep Like the Dead
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. When the wearer's Basic ATK or Skill does not result in a CRIT Hit, increases their CRIT Rate by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60% for 1 turn(s). This effect can only be triggered 1 time every 3 turn(s).

lightCones.name: I Venture Forth to Hunt
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 15%/17.5%/20%/22.5%/25%. When the wearer launches a follow-up attack, they gain 1 stack of "Luminflux" to a max of 2 stacks. Each stack of "Luminflux" enables the Ultimate DMG dealt by the wearer to ignore 27%/30%/33%/36%/39% of the target's DEF. When the wearer's turn ends, removes 1 stack of "Luminflux."

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Yanqing F2P Team
teams.description: This Yanqing F2P team specializes in high single-target damage. The Fire Trailblazer is needed to keep enemies taunted while Lynx can increase the chances of the Trailblazer being targeted.

teams.name: Yanqing Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
This Yanqing team provides a ton of DMG through the use of his Ultimate. Tingyun can provide an ATK buff and restore Yanqing's energy to let him use his Ultimate more frequently.

Sparkle will Advance Forward Yanqing's turns and provide DMG buffs so long as Yanqing uses his Skill often.

teams.name: Yanqing Freeze Team
teams.description: This Yanqing team focuses on Freezing enemies and is especially effective with the Path of Remembrance in Simulated Universe. Ruan Mei can increase Yanqing's Break Efficiency which helps deplete an enemy's toughness at a much faster rate.

teams.name: Yanqing Mono-Ice Team
teams.description: This Yanqing team comp is viable in certain content where the enemy is weak to Quantum but not to Ice. Silver Wolf is a must-have for this team so she can implant an Ice Weakness on an enemy.

lightCones.name: Memories of the Past
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When the wearer attacks, additionally regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

lightCones.name: Dance! Dance! Dance!
lightCones.description: When the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies' actions are Advanced Forward by 16%/18%/20%/22%/24%.

lightCones.name: Carve the Moon, Weave the Clouds
lightCones.description: At the start of the battle and whenever the wearer's turn begins, one of the following effects is applied randomly: All allies' ATK increases by 10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%, or all allies' Energy. Regeneration Rate increases by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%. The applied effect cannot be identical to the last effect applied, and will replace the previous effect. The applied effect will be removed when the wearer has been knocked down. Effects of the similar type cannot be stacked.

relicSets.name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Imaginary DMG by 10%.

relicSets.name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
relicSets.description: 2-pc: ATK increases by 12%.

planarSets.name: Broken Keel
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

teams.name: Yukong F2P Team
teams.description: This Free-to-Play Yukong team will have two DPS units who can benefit from Yukong's Skill buff. It's important for Yukong to either take her turn first (right before the two DPS units) or go last (just before the DPS units take their turn again).

teams.name: Standard Support Yukong Team
teams.description: Yukong can fit in any team comp since she provides buffs that increase stats relevant to dealing damage. Ideally, you will want a second damage dealer to benefit from the ATK% Yukong will provide from her Skill. You can also settle for a support that can deal damage.

teams.name: Yukong Imaginary Team
teams.description: A Yukong Imaginary team can be effective if all of the characters in it are built with a bit of damage dealing potential. All Imaginary characters in this team will want to use Wastelander of Banditry Desert to maximize their damage.

lightCones.name: Dance at Sunset
lightCones.description: Greatly increases the odds that the wearer will be attacked and increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, they receive 1 stack of Firedance, lasting for 2 turns and up to 2 stacks. Each stack of Firedance increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attack by 36%/42%/48%/54%/60%.

lightCones.name: The Unreachable Side
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

relicSets.name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
relicSets.description: 2-pc: ATK increases by 12%. 4-pc: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, increases the DMG dealt by their Ultimate by 30%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Inert Salsotto
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

teams.name: Yunli F2P Team
teams.description:
Lynx will be Yunli's best free-to-play Sustain since she can increase the chances of Yunli getting hit. The Remembrance Trailblazer can buff Yunli's CRIT DMG while Tingyun provides energy to Yunli, which she needs.

You can replace either supports with Pela if you don't have either one available.

teams.name: Yunli Hypercarry Team
teams.description: A hypercarry team with Yunli requires units that can restore her energy like Tingyun and Huohuo. This is so she can unleash her Ultimate as soon as possible.

teams.name: Yunli Dual DPS Team
teams.description: Yunli can also work well with another DPS on the team, especially if they do Follow-up attacks. Yunli can use the Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves relic set to increase her CRIT DMG for every Follow-up attack unleashed by the party.

lightCones.name: Long May Rainbows Adorn the Sky
lightCones.description: Increases the wearers SPD by 18%. When the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, consumes all allies HP equal to 1% of their current HP. After the next attack of its memosprite, additionally deal 1 instance of Additional DMG equal to 250% of the total consumed HP to the attacked target. Then, the total consumed HP is reset. When the wearers memosprite uses its Skill, increases the DMG taken by all enemies by 18% for 2 turn(s). Effects of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: This Love, Forever
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 18%. When the wearer's memosprite uses a Memosprite Skill on an ally, gains "Blank," which increases DMG taken by all enemies by 10%. When the wearer's memosprite uses a Memosprite Skill on an enemy, gains "Verse," which increases CRIT DMG of all allies by 16%. When the wearer's memosprite has both "Blank" and "Verse," increases the effects of "Blank" and "Verse" by 60%.

lightCones.name: Fly Into a Pink Tomorrow
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 12%. When equipped by Trailblazer (Remembrance), increases all ally targets' DMG dealt by 8% and DMG dealt by Enhanced Basic ATK "Together, We Script Tomorrow!" by 60%.

relicSets.name: World-Remaking Deliverer
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: After the wearer uses Basic ATK or Skill, if the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases Max HP of the wearer and their memosprite by 24%, and increases all allies' DMG by 15% until the wearer's next Basic ATK or Skill.

planarSets.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

teams.name: F2P TB (Remembrance) Team
teams.description: The Trailblazer's role in this free-to-play team is to provide supplemental True DMG and turn advances to the DPS. Characters like Herta can benefit from the extra DMG especially if they attack frequently.

teams.name: Trailblazer (Remembrance) Generalist Team
teams.description:
The Remembrance Trailblazer works best with characters that require a lot of energy to use their Ultimate. This is because if the character supported by Mem has an Ultimate cost of 100 or above, they deal more True DMG.

So characters like Argenti and The Herta are great characters to pair up with the Trailblazer since they have a high Ultimate cost. Characters that can restore energy like Sunday and Huohuo can help activate the Memosprite Talent as soon as possible.

teams.name: Trailblazer (Remembrance) Remembrance Team
teams.description:
The Remembrance Trailblazer with their 2nd Eidolon unlocked can work well with other Remembrance characters.

The Remembrance Trailblazer at E2 can apply the True DMG buff to the characters' memosprites and gain energy if an ally memosprite takes action.

lightCones.description: Increases the wearers SPD by 18%. When the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, consumes all allies HP equal to 1% of their current HP. planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.
