The Remembrance Trailblazer at E2 can apply the True DMG buff to the characters' memosprites and gain energy if an ally memosprite takes action.

lightCones.name: Time Woven Into Gold
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's base SPD by 12. After the wearer and the wearer's memosprite attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of "Brocade." Each stack of "Brocade" increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 9%, stacking up to 6 time(s). When reaching maximum stacks, each "Brocade" stack additionally increases Basic ATK DMG dealt by 9%.

lightCones.name: Sweat Now, Cry Less
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 12%. When the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases the wearer and their memosprite's DMG dealt by 24%.

lightCones.name: Geniuses' Greetings
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 16%. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, additionally increases the wearer and their memosprite's Basic ATK DMG dealt by 20% for 3 turns.

relicSets.name: Hero of Triumphant Song
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases ATK by 12%. 4-pc: While the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's memosprite attacks, increases the wearer and memosprite's CRIT DMG by 30% for 2 turns.

planarSets.name: The Wondrous BananAmusement Park
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When a target summoned by the wearer is on the field, CRIT DMG additionally increases by 32%.

teams.name: Aglaea F2P Team
teams.description:
Aglaea's best free-to-play teammate is the Remembrance Trailblazer at E2. The Remembrance Trailblazer can provide CRIT DMG buffs, True DMG, and turn advance to Aglaea, increasing her damage output.

Asta can provide ATK and SPD buffs with her kit while Lynx can heal and cleanse all party members.

teams.name: Aglaea Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
Aglaea's best team consists of Support units that provide buffs to her and her Garmentmaker summon. Sunday and Cyrene will be Aglaea's best supports since their turn advance and damage buffs respectively can also affect the summon.

Permansor Terrae is the best sustain unit for this team since he is a Chrysos Heir and can buff Aglaea's ATK.

lightCones.name: Life Should Be Cast to Flames
lightCones.description: When the wearer's turn starts, regenerates 10 Energy. If the enemy target has a Weakness implanted by the wearer, increases the wearer's DMG dealt to it by 60%. When an enemy target gets attacked by the wearer, the wearer decreases the target's DEF by 12%, lasting for 2 turns. The same types of effects cannot stack.

lightCones.name: Into the Unreachable Veil
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 12%. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases the Skill and Ultimate DMG dealt by the wearer by 60%, lasting for 3 turn(s). After the wearer. uses Ultimate, if this instance of Ultimate consumed 140 or more Energy, recovers 1 Skill Point.

lightCones.name: The Great Cosmic Enterprise
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 8%. For every 1 different Weakness Type an enemy target has, increases the DMG dealt to it by the wearer by 4%. Up to a max of 7 Weakness Types can be taken into account for this effect.

relicSets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

planarSets.name: Rutilant Arena
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

teams.name: Anaxa F2P Team
teams.description: For this free-to-play team, Anaxa will have both the Remembrance Trailblazer and Asta as supports. Since Anaxa can implant more weakness types onto an enemy, Asta can use her Skill to help inflict massive Toughness Bar damage.

teams.name: Anaxa Hypercarry Team
teams.description: Anaxa can be played in a hypercarry team comp with two supports and one sustain. Cyrene and Cerydra provide True DMG and Skill-related buffs respectively to Anaxa.

teams.name: Anaxa and The Herta Team
teams.description:
Anaxa can also work well as a second DPS to The Herta's team. Both Anaxa and The Herta have Bonus Abilities that can increase the entire party's DMG.

Tribbie is the best buffer for this team since her buffs apply to both DPS units. Permansor is the best Sustain unit for this team due to his summon's high base SPD and AoE attacks.

lightCones.name: The Hell Where Ideals Burn
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 16%. When entering battle and if the allies' Skill Points max limit is 6 or higher, increases the wearer's ATK by 40%. After the wearer uses a Skill, increases their ATK by 10%, stacking up to 4 time(s).

lightCones.name: Baptism of Pure Thought
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 20%/23%/26%/29%/32%. For every debuff on the enemy target, the wearer's CRIT DMG dealt against this target increases by 8%/9%/10%/11%/12%, stacking up to 3 times. When using Ultimate to attack the enemy target, the wearer receives the Disputation effect, which increases DMG dealt by 60% and enables their follow-up attacks to ignore 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% of the target's DEF. This effect lasts for 2 turns

lightCones.name: Worrisome, Blissful
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their follow-up attacks' DMG by 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%. After the wearer uses a follow-up attack, apply the Tame state to the target, stacking up to 2 stacks. When allies hit enemy targets under the Tame state, every Tame stack increases the CRIT DMG dealt by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%.

relicSets.name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

planarSets.name: Tengoku Livestream
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. If 3 or more Skill Points are consumed in the same turn, additionally increases CRIT DMG by 32% for 3 turns.

teams.name: Archer F2P Team
teams.description: For a free-to-play team, you can use any two Supports with Archer. Remembrance Trailblazer and Hanya his best free-to-play options for Archer since they provide turn-advance and SP-generation respectively.

teams.name: Archer Generalist Team
teams.description:
Archer's best teams consist of allies that provide Skill Points and are generally SP-friendly. It should be noted that turn-advance Supports should have at least 160 SPD to bring the slow Archer in front of the turn order.

Sparkle is undoubtedly Archer's best Support since she provides both Skill Points and turn-advance. Since Archer will consume a lot of Skill Points, using SP-Positive Sustains like Permansor Terrae or Gallagher will make your gameplay comfortable.

Cipher is usually the best option for debuffs and addtional damage. If the enemy isn't weak to Quantum then Silver Wolf is the better option between the two.

lightCones.name: Make Farewells More Beautiful
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 30%. When the wearer or their memosprite loses HP during their own turn, the wearer gains "Death Flower," which allows the wearer and their memosprite to ignore 30% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG, lasting for 2 turns. When the wearer's memosprite disappears, advances the wearer's action by 12%. This effect can only trigger up to 1 time, and the trigger count resets every time the wearer uses Ultimate.

lightCones.name: To Evernight's Stars
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 30%. When the wearer's memosprite uses an ability, the wearer gains "Noctis." While the wearer has "Noctis," all allies' memosprites ignore 20% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG. Increases the DMG dealt by the wearer and their memosprite by 30%. When the wearer's memosprite disappears, the wearer recovers 8 Energy. Effects of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: The Flower Remembers
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 24%. The CRIT DMG dealt by the wearer's memosprite increases by 24%.

relicSets.name: Poet of Mourning Collapse
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: Decreases the wearer's SPD by 8%. Before entering battle, if the wearer's SPD is less than 110/95, increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 20%/32%. This effect also applies to the wearer's memosprite.

planarSets.name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

teams.name: Castorice F2P Team
teams.description:
Castorice's best free-to-play teammate is the Remembrance Trailblazer with at least E1 unlocked. The Remembrance Trailblazer can provide CRIT DMG buffs, True DMG, and turn advance to Castorice, increasing her damage output.

Pela can decrease the DEF of all enemies while Lynx can increase Castorice's HP with her Skill.

teams.name: Castorice Premium Team
teams.description:
Castorice's best team features Evernight and Cyrene since their buffs help out the most for her damage.

Hyacine is the best healer for this team since she can heal all allies and increase the Max HP of the team. Hyacine can also consume more HP through Little Ica and buildup Newbud faster than any other sustain.

teams.name: Castorice Dual-DPS Team
teams.description: Castorice can also be used with another DPS that can consume their own HP. Characters like Mydei and Blade can help accumulate energy for Castorice's Ultimate.

lightCones.name: Epoch Etched in Golden Blood
lightCones.description: Increase the wearer's ATK by 64%. After using Ultimate to attack, recovers 1 Skill Point. When the wearer uses their skill on one ally character, increases the Skill DMG dealt by the target by 54% for 3 turns.

lightCones.name: Flowing Nightglow
lightCones.description: Every time an ally attacks, the wearer gains 1 stack of Cantillation. Each stack of Cantillation increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 3.0%/3.5%/4.0%/4.5%/5.0%, stacking up to 5 time(s). When the wearer uses their Ultimate, removes Cantillation and gains Cadenza. Cadenza increases the Wearer's ATK by 48%/60%/72%/84%/96% and increases all allies' DMG dealt by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: A Grounded Ascent
lightCones.description: After the wearer uses Skill or Ultimate on one ally character, the wearer regenerates 6 Energy and the ability's target receives 1 stack of "Hymn" for 3 turn(s), stacking up to 3 time(s). Each stack of "Hymn" increases its holder's DMG dealt by 15%. After every 2 instance(s) of Skill or Ultimate the wearer uses on one ally character, recovers 1 Skill Point.

relicSets.name: Sacerdos' Relieved Ordeal
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%. 4-pc: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability-using target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

planarSets.name: Lushaka, the Sunken Seas
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. If the wearer is not the first character in the team lineup, then increase the ATK of the first character in the team lineup by 12%.

teams.name: Cerydra F2P Team
teams.description: Cerydra can be used to buff Dan Heng and make him use his Skill twice. The Remembrance Trailblazer and Lynx can also help via True DMG buffs and healing respectively.

teams.name: Cerydra Generalist Team
teams.description:
Cerydra is best used with a DPS that mainly uses Skill DMG and scale with ATK. Phainon is the best DPS to be paired up with Cerydra since a lot of his DMG during his Enhanced State is Skill DMG.

Teams with Cerydra will also need turn-advance units like Sunday or Bronya for faster Charge buildup. Huohuo is the best Sustain here since she can also buff ATK, and restore the energy of her allies.

lightCones.name: Lies Dance on the Breeze
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 18%. After the wearer uses an attack, there's a 120% base chance to inflict "Bamboozle" on every enemy. While under "Bamboozle", enemies have their DEF decreased by 16% for 2 turns. If the wearer's SPD is higher or equal to 170, there's a 120% base chance to inflict "Theft" on every enemy. While under "Theft", enemies have their DEF decreased by 8% for 2 turns. When "Bamboozle" or "Theft" is repeatedly inflicted, only the recently inflicted instance takes effect.

lightCones.name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat
lightCones.description: When the wearer hits an enemy and if the hit enemy is not already Ensnared, then there is a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% base chance to Ensnare the hit enemy. Ensnared enemies' DEF decreases by 12%/13%/14%/15%/16% for 1 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Holiday Thermae Escapade
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's DMG dealt by 16%. After the wearer attacks, there is a 100% base chance that the attacked target is inflicted with Vulnerability, increasing the DMG they receive by 10% for 2 turn(s). The same effect type cannot be stacked.

relicSets.name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%. 4-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Cipher F2P Team
teams.description: For a free-to-play team, you can use any DPS with Cipher provided that they benefit from her debuffs. As for other units, Asta is a great F2P Support for Cipher since she can buff her SPD, which Cipher needs.

teams.name: Cipher Acheron Team
teams.description:
Cipher can do great in an Acheron team as both a Sub-DPS and a speedy debuffer that can help buildup Slashed Dream. With E0 Acheron, you will need another Nihility character to unlock the full damage buff.

If Acheron is at E2, you can use a Harmony unit since she only needs one Nihility unit to activate the damage buff fully.

teams.name: Cipher Follow-Up Attack Team
teams.description: As a Follow-Up attacker, Cipher can be an excellent Sub-DPS to Feixiao or Dr. Ratio thanks to her frequent attacks and debuffs. Ideally, you'd want units that can provide debuffs to have the Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters at full uptime.

teams.name: Cipher Quantum Team
teams.description:
Cipher can also work as a Sub-DPS to Archer. Cipher can simply use her Basic Attacks to generate Skill Points that Archer can use.

Sparkle provides Skill Point generation to the party and Permansor Terrae can increase Archer's ATK with his shield.

lightCones.name: This Love, Forever
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 18%. When the wearer's memosprite uses a Memosprite Skill on an ally, gains "Blank," which increases DMG taken by all enemies by 10%. When the wearer's memosprite uses a Memosprite Skill on an enemy, gains "Verse," which increases CRIT DMG of all allies by 16%. When the wearer's memosprite has both "Blank" and "Verse," increases the effects of "Blank" and "Verse" by 60%.

lightCones.name: Memory's Curtain Never Falls
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%. After the wearer uses Skill, increases the DMG dealt by all allies by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Long May Rainbows Adorn the Sky
lightCones.description: Increases the wearers SPD by 18%. When the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, consumes all allies HP equal to 1% of their current HP. After the next attack of its memosprite, additionally deal 1 instance of Additional DMG equal to 250% of the total consumed HP to the attacked target. Then, the total consumed HP is reset. When the wearers memosprite uses its Skill, increases the DMG taken by all enemies by 18% for 2 turn(s). Effects of the same type cannot stack.

relicSets.name: Sacerdos' Relieved Ordeal
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.

relicSets.name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases SPD by 6%.

planarSets.name: Sprightly Vonwacq
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

teams.name: Cyrene F2P Team
teams.description: Cyrene can be paired with the Remembrance Trailblazer and Permansor Terrae for the free-to-play team. You can use any DPS for this team, provided that you have two Chrysos Heirs in the team to battery Cyrene's first Ultimate.

teams.name: Cyrene Chrysos Heir Teams
teams.description:
Cyrene is best used on a team that consists at least two Chrysos Heir characters. Having Chrysos Heirs in the team increases the amount of Recollection she gains at the start of the battle, and also the Recollection she gets during battle.

This allows Cyrene to have an easier time charging her Ultimate. On top of the Recollection stacks, Cyrene also grants unique buffs to each Chrysos Heir which makes them a lot stronger.
teamMembers: Hyacine / Permansor Terrae / Permansor Terrae / Hyacine

lightCones.name: Though Worlds Apart
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 64%. When the wearer uses Ultimate, restores HP equal to 10% of the wearer's ATK for all allies, and additionally restores HP equal to 10% of the wearer's ATK for the character with the lowest current HP, and grants "Redoubt" to all allies for 3 turns. Targets with "Redoubt" deal 24% more DMG, which further increases by 12% if the targets have summons.

lightCones.name: Journey, Forever Peaceful
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's provided Shield Effect by 12%. When an ally target has a Shield, the DMG dealt increases by 12%.

lightCones.name: She Already Shut Her Eyes
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40% and Energy Regeneration Rate by 12%/14%/16%/18%/20%. When the wearer's HP is reduced, all allies' DMG dealt increases by 9%/10.5%/12%/13.5%/15%, for 2 turn(s). At the start of every wave, restores HP to all allies by an amount equal to 80%/85%/90%/95%/100% of their respective lost HP.

relicSets.name: Self-Enshrouded Recluse
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Shield Effect by 10%. 4-pc: Increases Shield Effect provided by the wearer by 12%. When an ally target has a Shield provided by the wearer, their CRIT DMG increases by 15%.

planarSets.name: Lushaka, the Sunken Seas
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. If the wearer is not the first character in the team lineup, then increase the ATK of the first character in the team lineup by 12%.

teams.name: Permansor Terrae F2P Team
teams.description: Permansor Terrae's best free-to-play team has Dan Heng as his DPS unit. Permansor Terrae can comfortably provide team-wide shields while also providing Dan Heng ATK buffs along with Asta and Yukong's buffs.

teams.name: Permansor Terrae Single DPS Team
teams.description:
Permansor Terrae is best used in a team that focuses on a single DPS, due to him only having one Bondmate at a time. That Bondmate should ideally be able to take multiple turns within a cycle for Permansor Terrae's energy generation.

The supports must also have ways to make the team take multiple turns within a cycle to fully utilize this team.

teams.name: Permansor Terrae DoT Team
teams.description: Permansor Terrae can work well with characters that deal DoT damage due to their ATK scaling. The only downside would be the fact that only one character can be his Bondmate when a DoT team usually consists of 2 or more DoT characters.

lightCones.name: To Evernight's Stars
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 30%. When the wearer's memosprite uses an ability, the wearer gains "Noctis." While the wearer has "Noctis," all allies' memosprites ignore 20% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG. Increases the DMG dealt by the wearer and their memosprite by 30%. When the wearer's memosprite disappears, the wearer recovers 8 Energy. Effects of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: Make Farewells More Beautiful
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 30%. When the wearer or their memosprite loses HP during their own turn, the wearer gains "Death Flower," which allows the wearer and their memosprite to ignore 30% of the target's DEF when dealing DMG, lasting for 2 turns. When the wearer's memosprite disappears, advances the wearer's action by 12%. This effect can only trigger up to 1 time, and the trigger count resets every time the wearer uses Ultimate.

lightCones.name: Sweat Now, Cry Less
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 12%. When the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases the wearer and their memosprite's DMG dealt by 24%.

relicSets.name: World-Remaking Deliverer
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: After the wearer uses Basic ATK or Skill, if the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases Max HP of the wearer and their memosprite by 24%, and increases all allies' DMG by 15% until the wearer's next Basic ATK or Skill.

planarSets.name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

teams.name: Evernight F2P Team
teams.description: Evernight can be paired with the Remembrance Trailblazer for a free-to-play Memosprite team. You can use any CRIT DPS for this free-to-play team.

teams.name: Evernight Remembrance Team
teams.description: Evernight is best used on a team that consists of all or mostly Remembrance characters. She works best when paired with Castorice since the HP-Drain will help her gain more Memoria stacks.

teams.name: Evernight Main DPS Team
teams.description: Evernight can also work amazingly as a standalone DPS. You would still want at least two Remembrance Support units in this team to access the CRIT DMG buff.

lightCones.name: Long May Rainbows Adorn the Sky
lightCones.description: Increases the wearers SPD by 18%. When the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate, consumes all allies HP equal to 1% of their current HP. After the next attack of its memosprite, additionally deal 1 instance of Additional DMG equal to 250% of the total consumed HP to the attacked target. Then, the total consumed HP is reset. When the wearers memosprite uses its Skill, increases the DMG taken by all enemies by 18% for 2 turn(s). Effects of the same type cannot stack.

lightCones.name: Memory's Curtain Never Falls
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%. After the wearer uses Skill, increases the DMG dealt by all allies by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16%, lasting for 3 turn(s).

lightCones.name: This Love, Forever
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 18%. When the wearer's memosprite uses a Memosprite Skill on an ally, gains "Blank," which increases DMG taken by all enemies by 10%. When the wearer's memosprite uses a Memosprite Skill on an enemy, gains "Verse," which increases CRIT DMG of all allies by 16%. When the wearer's memosprite has both "Blank" and "Verse," increases the effects of "Blank" and "Verse" by 60%.

relicSets.name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
relicSets.description: 2-pc: SPD increases by 6%. 4-pc: When the wearer and their memosprite provide healing to ally targets aside from themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which can be triggered up to 1 time per turn, lasting for 2 turns. When the wearer has "Gentle Rain," increases SPD by 6%, and increases all allies' CRIT DMG by 15%. This effect cannot be stacked.

planarSets.name: Giant Tree of Rapt Brooding
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's Speed is 135/180 or higher, increases the wearer and their memosprite's Outgoing Healing by 12%/20%.

teams.name: Hyacine F2P Team
teams.description:
Hyacine can be paired with the Remembrance Trailblazer for a free-to-play Memosprite team. Pela is here to help decrease the enemy's DEF with her Ultimate.

You can use any CRIT DPS for this free-to-play team, but HP-scaling units will benefit more from Hyacine.

teams.name: Hyacine HP-Scaling Team
teams.description:
Hyacine is the best sustain unit for teams centered on the HP stat. Characters like Castorice, Tribbie, and Blade will have their damage increased from Hyacine's Ultimate.

Hyacine works best with units that drain the party's HP since she can provide healing when HP gets reduced. This is especially useful for Castorice since Hyacine's healing can help generate more Newbud than any other Sustain.

lightCones.name: Why Does the Ocean Sing
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 40%. When the wearer inflicts a debuff, there is an 80% base chance to apply "Enthrallment", lasting for 3 turns. Effects of the same type can't stack. While affected by "Enthrallment," each debuff inflicted by the wearer on the target increases the target's DoT taken by 5%, up to 6 times. When attacked by an ally, increases the attacker's SPD by 10% for 3 turns. When the wearer is knocked down, removes all "Enthrallment."

lightCones.name: Reforged Remembrance
lightCones.description: Increases wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 40%/45%/50%/55%/60%. When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy inflicted with Wind Shear, Burn, Shock, or Bleed, each respectively grants 1 stack of Prophet, stacking up to 4 time(s). In a single battle, only 1 stack of Prophet can be granted for each type of DoT. Every stack of Prophet increases wearer's ATK by 5%/6%/7%/8%/9% and enables the DoT dealt to ignore 7.2%/7.9%/8.6%/9.3%/10% of the target's DEF.

lightCones.name: Those Many Springs
lightCones.description: Increases Effect Hit Rate by 60%/70%/80%/90%/100%. After the wearer uses Basic ATK, Skill, or Ultimate to attack, there is a 60% base chance to inflict "Unarmored". While in the Unarmored state, target receives 10%/12%/14%/16%/18% increased DMG for 2 turns. If the target is under a DoT inflicted by the wearer, there's a 60% chance to upgrade "Unarmored" to the "Cornered" state, which increases the DMG the target receives by 14%/16%/18%/20%/22%, lasting for 2 turns. During this, the wearer can't inflict "Unarmored" on the target.

relicSets.name: Prisoner In Deep Confinement
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases ATK by 12%. 4-pc: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

planarSets.name: Revelry by the Sea
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's ATK is higher than or equal to 2,400/3,600, increases the DoT DMG dealt by 12%/24%.

teams.name: Hysilens F2P Team
teams.description: For a free-to-play team, you can pair Hysilens with Serval since the latter can apply the Shock DoT. Asta is a great free-to-play Support for her ATK and SPD buffs.

teams.name: Hysilens DoT + Buffer Team
teams.description:
This Hysilens team has her paired with Kafka. Both of them can help deal damage by applying DoTs and triggering them respectively.

Ruan Mei is the best Support here since she can delay the enemy's Weakness Break recovery, allowing them to receive more DoTs. Huohuo is the best Sustain for this team since she can buff the party's ATK and restore their energy.

You can also slot in Robin instead of Ruan Mei. The ATK buffs Robin provides may be diluted in this kind of team, but her team-wide turn advance is very useful for cycle-based game modes.

teams.name: Hysilens Triple DoT Team
teams.description:
You can also use Hysilens on a team with two other DoT units. A third DoT unit can provide extra damage and help Kafka trigger more DoTs with her kit.

Black Swan works best here for her Arcana mechanics and the DEF reduction she applies on enemies.

lightCones.name: Flame of Blood, Blaze My Path
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 18% and Incoming Healing by 20%. When using Skill or Ultimate, consumes HP equal to 6% of the wearer's Max HP and increases the DMG dealt by this attack by 30%. If this effect's consumed HP is greater than 500, the DMG additionally increases by 30%. If the current HP is not sufficient, this effect reduces the wearer's current HP down to 1.

lightCones.name: The Unreachable Side
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30% and their Max HP by 18%/21%/24%/27%/30%. When the wearer is attacked or consumes their own HP, their DMG increases by 24%/28%/32%/36%/40%. This effect is removed after the wearer uses an attack.

lightCones.name: Ninja Record: Sound Hunt
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24%. When losing HP or restoring HP, increases CRIT DMG by 18%/22%/27%/31%/36%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can only trigger 1 time per turn.

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

teams.name: Mydei F2P Team
teams.description: In this free-to-play team, Mydei can use the Remembrance Trailblazer for the CRIT DMG buff and Pela for DEF shred. Lynx is a great free-to-play sustain for Mydei as she can increase his Max HP and his chances of getting hit by the enemy.

teams.name: Mydei Hypercarry Team
teams.description:
Mydei's best team features Cyrene for her DMG buffs, and Cerydra's Skill DMG buffs. With Cyrene on the team, Hyacine should be your sustain unit since she is a Chrysos Heir and can increase Mydei's HP.

If you don't have Cyrene on the team, we recommend using other Abundance units like Luocha and Gallagher since they provide more healing.

teams.name: Mydei Dual-DPS Team
teams.description:
Mydei can also be used as a Sub-DPS for Castorice. Mydei's HP consumption can buildup Newbud for Castorice's Ultimate.

Tribbie will buff both Mydei and Castorice with her buffs, while Gallagher can use the Besotted debuff to provide constant healing.

lightCones.name: Thus Burns the Dawn
lightCones.description: The wearer's base SPD increases by 12. When the wearer deals DMG, ignores 18% of the target's DEF. After the wearer uses Ultimate, obtains "Blazing Sun," which is removed at the start of their turn. While "Blazing Sun" is in possession, increases the wearer's DMG dealt by 60%.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

lightCones.name: A Trail of Bygone Blood
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 12%. The Skill DMG and Ultimate DMG dealt by the wearer increase by 24%.

relicSets.name: Wavestrider Captain
relicSets.description: 2-pc: CRIT DMG increases by 16%. 4-pc: When the wearer is the target of another ally target's ability, gains 1 stack of "Help," stacking up to 2 times. When using Ultimate, if the unit possesses 2 stacks of "Help," consumes all "Help" and increases the wearer's ATK by 48%, lasting 1 turn.

planarSets.name: Arcadia of Woven Dreams
planarSets.description: When there are currently more or less than 4 ally targets in battle, each additional/missing ally target increases the wearer and their memosprite's DMG by 9%/12%, up to a maximum of 4/3 stacks.

teams.name: Phainon F2P Team
teams.description:
For a free-to-play team, you can use any two Supports with Phainon as long as they have buffs that only target him.

Remembrance Trailblazer in particular is useful on Phainon teams since Mem's charge can accumulate even if Phainon is in his enhanced state.

teams.name: Phainon Generalist Team
teams.description:
Phainon's best general team consists of Supports that provide turn advance and energy restoration. Do note that Phainon's CRIT DMG buff from his Talent can only be activated if the buff provided by the Support only targets him.

Sunday and Cerydra are the best Supports since they provide Phainon turn advance and Skill DMG buffs respectively. Huohuo can provide Energy restoration and ATK buffs, which Phainon can benefit from.

teams.name: Phainon Sustainless Team
teams.description: Phainon can also be used on a team without any Sustain units. This is because most of the time, Phainon will be in his Enhanced State. This temporarily removes other allies from active combat and prevents them from taking DMG.

lightCones.name: A Thankless Coronation
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%. When using their Ultimate, increases the wearer's ATK by 40%, and if the wearer's Max Energy is greater than or equal to 300, regenerates a fixed amount of Energy equal to 10% of the wearer's Max Energy and increases their ATK by 40% for 2 turns.

lightCones.name: Thus Burns the Dawn
lightCones.description: The wearer's base SPD increases by 12. When the wearer deals DMG, ignores 18% of the target's DEF. After the wearer uses Ultimate, obtains "Blazing Sun," which is removed at the start of their turn. While "Blazing Sun" is in possession, increases the wearer's DMG dealt by 60%.

lightCones.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
lightCones.description: Whenever the wearer attacks, increase their ATK by 8%/10%/12%/14%/16% in this battle, up to 4 time(s). When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on enemies, the wearer's DMG increases by 12%/15%/18%/21%/24% for 2 turns

relicSets.name: Wavestrider Captain
relicSets.description: 2-pc: CRIT DMG increases by 16%. 4-pc: When the wearer is the target of another ally target's ability, gains 1 stack of "Help," stacking up to 2 times. When using Ultimate, if the unit possesses 2 stacks of "Help," consumes all "Help" and increases the wearer's ATK by 48%, lasting 1 turn.

planarSets.name: Firmament Frontline Glamoth
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

teams.name: Saber F2P Team
teams.description:
For a free-to-play team, you can use any two Supports with Saber as long as they have buffs that only target her.

The Remembrance Trailblazer and Tingyun are great for Saber thanks to their True DMG buffs and Energy Restoration respectively.

teams.name: Saber Generalist Team
teams.description:
Saber's best teams consist of Supports that provide energy restoration and turn-advance. Sunday and Robin both fit into this role while also providing strong buffs to Saber.

Huohuo is the best Support here since she can provide Energy and ATK buffs to the party.

lightCones.name: Never Forget Her Flame
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%. When entering combat, increases Break DMG dealt by the wearer and another teammate who triggered combat by 32%. If there is no teammate who triggered combat, applies this effect to the wearer and the teammate with the highest Break Effect. Effects of the same type cannot be stacked. When the wearer applies Weakness to an enemy target, recovers 1 Skill Point. This effect can only trigger once, and trigger count resets when using Ultimate.

lightCones.name: Long Road Leads Home
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 60%. When an enemy target's Weakness gets broken, there is a 100% base chance to inflict the "Charring" state on it, which increases its Break DMG taken by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack 2 time(s).

lightCones.name: Resolution Shines As Pearls of Sweat
lightCones.description: When the wearer hits an enemy and if the hit enemy is not already Ensnared, then there is a 60%/70%/80%/90%/100% base chance to Ensnare the hit enemy. Ensnared enemies' DEF decreases by 12%/13%/14%/15%/16% for 1 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Break Effect by 16%. 4-pc: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, ignores 10% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing Break DMG to them. When the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG they deal to enemy targets additionally ignores 15% of the targets' DEF.

planarSets.name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits an enemy target that has Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

teams.name: The Dahlia F2P Team
teams.description: The Dahlia's role in this free-to-play team is to provide DEF shred and Super Break to the team. Xueyi can benefit the most from this, since her Follow-up attacks require the enemies' Toughness to be reduced.

teams.name: The Dahlia Super Break Team
teams.description: The Dahlia is best used in a Break Effect team as the Super Break enabler. The Dahlia can use her Skill to allow her allied units to deal Super Break DMG even if the enemies are not Weakness Broken, as well as increase their Weakness Break efficiency.

lightCones.name: Into the Unreachable Veil
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 12%. When the wearer uses Ultimate, increases the Skill and Ultimate DMG dealt by the wearer by 60%, lasting for 3 turn(s). After the wearer. uses Ultimate, if this instance of Ultimate consumed 140 or more Energy, recovers 1 Skill Point.

lightCones.name: Today Is Another Peaceful Day
lightCones.description: After entering battle, increases the wearer's DMG based on their Max Energy. DMG increases by 0.2%/0.25%/0.3%/0.35%/0.4% per point of Energy, up to 160 Energy.

lightCones.name: Geniuses' Repose
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 16%/20%/24%/28%/32%. When the wearer defeats an enemy, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by 24%/30%/36%/42%/48% for 3 turn(s).

relicSets.name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases CRIT Rate by 8%. 4-pc: Increases DMG dealt by Ultimate and Skill by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

planarSets.name: Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When entering battle, if at least one other ally follows the same Path as the wearer, then the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

teams.name: The Herta F2P Team
teams.description:
Fortunately for The Herta, she has access to two free-to-play Erudition units in the form of her Herta puppet and Serval.

We recommend using an Energy Regen rope and the Passkey Light Cone for your other Erudition DPS. This is so they can use their Ultimates to attack and build up Interpretation consistently.

As for your Support unit, you can use the Remembrance Trailblazer do a turn advance with Memosprite Skill and have The Herta deal additional True DMG.

teams.name: The Herta Erudition Team
teams.description:
The Herta's best team should always consist of another Erudition DPS to maximize her kit. Anaxa will be The Herta's best party member since he can use two Skills in one turn and is helpful in single-target scenarios.

Tribbie is great for buffing all party members and unleashing Follow-up attacks to restore The Herta's energy. Permansor Terrae proves The Herta with shields, an ATK buff, and the Souldragon which can easily build up Interpretation.

lightCones.name: If Time Were a Flower
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 36%. After the wearer launches a Follow-up ATK, additionally regenerates 12 Energy and gains "Presage," lasting for 2 turn(s). While the wearer has "Presage," all ally targets' CRIT DMG increases by 48%. When entering battle, the wearer regenerates 21 Energy and gains "Presage," lasting for 2 turn(s).

lightCones.name: Dance! Dance! Dance!
lightCones.description: When the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies' actions are Advanced Forward by 16%/18%/20%/22%/24%.

lightCones.name: Memories of the Past
lightCones.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 28%/35%/42%/49%/56%. When the wearer attacks, additionally regenerates 4/5/6/7/8 Energy. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

relicSets.name: Poet of Mourning Collapse
relicSets.description: 2-pc: Increases Quantum DMG by 10%. 4-pc: Decreases the wearer's SPD by 8%. Before entering battle, if the wearer's SPD is less than 110/95, increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 20%/32%. This effect also applies to the wearer's memosprite.

planarSets.name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
planarSets.description: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

teams.name: Tribbie F2P Team
teams.description:
Tribbie's best free-to-play team has Serval and Herta as her DPS units. This team is best used in content where with more than three enemies.

Use Tribbie's kit to buff both Serval and Herta and help them deal more damage.

teams.name: Tribbie Dual-DPS Team
teams.description:
Tribbie is best used in Dual DPS teams that focus on AoE DMG. The Herta has the best synergy with Tribbie since their kits can help restore each other's energy and damage.

Characters who can easily access their Ultimate' like Argenti and Serval (with S5 Passkey), can help Tribbie unleash her Follow-up attacks more frequently.

Characters who attack frequently like, Anaxa, Jade and Lingsha can help restore Tribbie's energy simply by hitting the enemy.

teams.name: Tribbie HP Team
teams.description:
Tribbie can work well with other characters that scale on the HP stat since her Glass Ball with Wings! Bonus Ability can increase her Max HP depending on all allies' Max HP.

The more HP Tribbie has, the stronger her attacks get. Tribbie can also benefit HP-scaling DPS units especially if they deal AoE DMG.
